loans.name: Amenatu

texts.en: Amenatu A. sells food supplies like gari (which is made from cassava) and maize at Breman, near Elmina. She is married and has 4 children. Her husband is a farmer. She assists her husband with the payment of the family's expenses. Her loan will be used to buy more sacks of gari and maize for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy a land.

loans.use: Her loan will be used to buy more sacks of gari and maize for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more shoe repairing materials

loans.name: Atta

texts.en:
Atta P. sells fish and maize. She also sells children's clothing and footwear by moving from one house to the other at Breman near Elmina. Atta has received junior high education. She is married and has one child. Her husband is a carpenter. 

Atta has been in this trade for three years. She assists her husband in the general upkeep of the home. Her loan will be used to buy more fish and bags of maize and children's clothing for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to re-invest into the sale of chlidren's clothing.

loans.use: buy more fish and bags of maize and children's clothing for sale

loans.name: Las Doncellas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Doncellas está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedora una de ella es la señora Blanca Zolorzano desde hace cuatro años vende celulares con el cual ha sacado adelante sus cuatros hijos. Ella tiene el sueño de poner su propia tienda de celulares.

Las otras integrantes de grupos son Irma Isaguirre Osorio quien vende perfumes y Noelia L. tiene una fritanga.
texts.en:
The group "Las Doncellas" is made up of 3 hardworking and enterprising women.  One of these is Blanca Zolorzano, who has been selling cellular phones for 4 years and has supported her 4 children with this business.  She has a dream of having her own cellular phone store.  

The other members of the group are Irma Isaguirre Osorio, who sells perfumes, and Noelia L., who has a fried food stand.

loans.use: to buy cellular phones

loans.name: Felix Manuel

texts.es: Félix se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, desde hace 20 años, es un padre muy responsable el siempre está preocupado por proporcionarle a sus hijos y familia lo más necesario. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos en Fundación pues han sido de gran ayuda a su negocio. Todos los días tiene que alistarse temprano para ir a comprar las diferentes frutas y verduras que ofrece a su negocio. El decide realizar este crédito para la compra de naranjas, bananos, sandias, repollos, cebollas, tomares entre otras cosas.
texts.en:
Félix has worked selling fruits and vegetables for 20 years. He is a responsible father, always concerned with providing the necessities for his family. This is not the first time he has taken out a loan with Fundación Leon 2000; they have been a great help in developing his business.

Every day, Félix gets up early to purchase the various fruits and vegetables that he offers his customers. He will use this loan to purchase oranges, bananas, watermelons, cabbages, onions, tomatoes, and more.

loans.use: Purchase fruits and vegetables for sale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more candles, palm oil, matches, etc.

loans.name: Mara

texts.es: Mara, de 33 años, vive en casa de su hermano en compañía de él y de su esposo Luis de 43 años y de su pequeña hija; esta emprendedora mujer se esfuerza a diario por salir adelante. Cada día esta emprendedora mujer se despierta muy temprano para realizar las labores de su hogar; y al mediodía empieza con su labor de comerciante de productos de belleza de diversas marcas. A la venta de cosméticos se dedica desde hace dos  años y por temporadas vende de una marca y luego cambia, también comercializa bijouteria para damas. Le gusta mucho su labor pues le permite obtener ganancias para apoyar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, además no descuida la crianza de sus hijos. Ya tiene pensado para el futuro instalar un restaurante en un gran mercado de la zona, de esta manera espera seguir adelante. Es el tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en su negocio. Mara tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de variedad de mercadería en productos de belleza, pues quiere abastecerse y tener su mercadería en stock para ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en: Mara is 33 years old and she lives in her brother's house in his company and with her husband, Luis, who is 33 years old, and their little girl. This enterprising woman work hard every day to make ends meet. This enterprising woman starts her every day very early to do housework. AT noon time she starts selling beauty products of various brand names. She has been selling cosmetics for two years, selling products of one brand name during certain season and then changing. She also sells ladies' jewelry. She really enjoys her work because she is able to earn an income to help her husband with her household expenses and she is able to take care of her children.  In the future she plans on installing a restaurant at a large market in the region, another way to get ahead. This is her third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to making her payments on time. She doesn't want to cause hardship to any of those individuals who have made this loan possible, permitting her to continue on in her business. Mara plans on investing the loan she requested on the purchase of a variety of beauty products.  She wants to increase her inventory and have enough to offer the best to her clients.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase cosmetics and beauty supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more phone cards

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Don Sergio, de 66 años de edad, posee una tapicería de muebles de madera y vehículos, él vive con su esposa en la Ciudad de San Miguel departamento de San Miguel, este negocio fue por iniciativa propia, haciéndolo desde hace 20 años, trabaja de lunes a sábado de 7:00am a 5:00pm, hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultades con el negocio.
Don Sergio necesita un préstamo para la compra de telas de diferentes clases y colores, hilos, pega y otros que son necesarios para la tapicería de muebles, ya que el no cuenta con suficiente inventario para cumplir con los trabajos que le llegan, este préstamo le ayudara a salir de esta situación.
La aspiración de él es que a través del buen trabajo que realiza pueda ganar clientela y de esta manera estabilizarse económicamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Sergio is 66 years old. He has an upholstering business for wood furniture and vehicles. He lives with his wife in the city of San Miguel, departament of San Miguel. He started this business on his own initiative and has been doing it for 20 years. He works Mondays through Saturdays from 7:00 am until 5:00 pm. So far, he has had no problems with the business.

Sergio needs a loan to buy different kinds and colors of fabrics as well as thread and glue and other things necessary for furniture upholstery. He doesn't have enough inventory to finish the jobs he gets, and this loan will help him get out of this. 

He aspires to being able to gain clientele through his good work and in this way stabilize himself financially with his family. .

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread and glue.

loans.name: Elvin Antonio

texts.es:
El Senor Elvin H., habita en la Comunidad El Coyolito, del Departamento de Esteli; Soltero, no tiene hijos, tiene 32 anos de edad.
Tuvo una ninez muy dura, desde la edad de 12 anos comenzo a trabajar, ayudando a sus padres en las actividades de Agricultura y Ganaderia, ayudando a su Papa a limpiar los huertos; y al mismo tiempo estudiaba, y con muchas dificultades logro terminar a penas la primaria, en el Colegio de su comunidad. Con ayuda de su Papa logro conseguir una beca para estudiar Tecnico Medio Agropecuario, en Muy Muy, Matagalpa, y termino hace 10 anos.
Consiguio un trabajo en la Coperativa SEPROCON, y al mismo tiempo ayudaba a su Papa con las actividades de siembra.
Con el tiempo decidio retirarse de ese trabajo y dedicarse a lo que el habia estudiado; decidio producir la tierra y poner una granja Avicola, es decir de Aves ponedoras, poco a poco fue mejorando y logro instalar un sistema de Riego por Goteo.
Con este credito pretende mejorar la calidad de sus cultivos, dar oportunidad de empleo a otras personas.
Dentro de sus metas esta ser autosostenible, para no necesitar de creditos, activar la granja, mejorar los Invernaderos que tiene y hacerlos producir.
texts.en:
Mr. Elvin H. lives in the community of El Coyolito in the department of Esteli. He is single, he doesn't have children, and he is 32 years of age. 

He had a very difficult childhood. He started to work when he was 12 years old, helping his parents in their agriculture and farming, especially helping his father clear the plantations. He went to school at the same time and with tremendous effort he managed to complete the primary grades at a school in the community. With the help of his father he managed to secure a student loan to learn to be an Agricultural Technician in Muy Muy, Matagalpa. He graduated 10 years ago. 

He became employed at the Coperativa Seprocon and he also continued to help his father with the plantations. 

In time he decided to stop that work and instead to work in his field of study full time. He decided to cultivate land and to set up a chicken farm, more specifically an egg producing facility. He slowly saw improvements and he managed to set up a water irrigation system. 

With this loan he plans on improving the quality of his cultivations and to create employment for others. 

Among his goals is to be financially secure, so as to no longer require loans, to expand his chicken farm, and to improve the greenhouses that he has to make them more productive.

loans.use: To cultivate vegetables.

loans.name: Bilma

texts.es:
la sra. Bilma B. C. se dedica a la venta de carnes, posee una carniceria. El crecimiento de sus negocio es notable, ahora tiene un cliente que viaja una vez a la semana desde Tegucigalpa hasta esta ciudad a comprarle carne al por mayor, las compras oscilan entre Lbs.400 a Lbs.500 semanales, aparte de lo vende al detalle, su local es higiénico y de un ambiente agradable. 
Cabe mencionar que el local donde tiene ubicado su negocio es muy apto para este tipo de actividad.
Su compañero de hogar se dedica a la compra de ganado en pie o mejor dicho la compra de ganado en los corrales, mismos que después son llevados al rastro para el destazo para luego hacer la distribución de la carne.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ganado para destazo.
Bilma se siente muy feliz ya que su negocio cada dia va creciendo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bilma B. C.  sells meat. She owns a butcher shop. The growth of her business is notable. She now has a customer who travels one a week from Tegucigalpa to her city to by meat from her wholesale. The purchases are between 400 lbs.to 500 lbs. a week, apart from what she sells retail. Her locale is sanitary and has a pleasant atmosphere. 

It is worth mentioning that the locale where she has her business is very suitable for this type of activity. 

The man she lives with buys standing cattle, that is, penned cattle. These are later taken to the market to be butchered for the meat to be later distributed.  

She will use the loan to buy cattle to butcher. Bilma feels happy since her business is growing every day.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more bags of rice, beans, flour, sugar, milk etc.

loans.name: Santos Jacobo

texts.es: El señor Santos Jacobo posee un negocio que es brindar el servicio de transporte y pulpería.  El tiene 45 años, la pulpería  está ubicada en su casa de habitación, pero el mismo brinda el servicio de transporte en su triciclo ya que todos los días tiene que levantarse temprano y prepararse para atender a todos sus clientes. Mantener estos negocios no ha sido fácil, pero las ganas de salir adelante y proporciónale a su hijo lo necesario son los factores que lo motivan a continuar. Este crédito es para la compra de materia prima para la pulpería y repuesto para su triciclo,  A pesar de no tener mucho dinero vive muy feliz con su familia y cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. Como toda persona luchadora tiene los sueños de continuar trabajando para su familia.
texts.en: Santos Jacobo has a convenience store business and he also provides transportation services. He is 45 years old and his convenience store is located in his home. He provides transportation services on his tricycle and every day he needs to start very early to be able to attend to his clients. The management of these businesses has not be easy but his sheer will to get ahead and to provide his son with what he needs have been the motivating factors that keep him going. This loan will be used to purchase merchandise for his convenience store and to repair his tricycle. Despite not having very much money he leads a very happy life with his family and they enjoy all the basic commodities. Like any other hardworking person his dreams are to keep working for the welfare of his family.

loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: Jose Ezequias

texts.es:
José Ezequías, tiene 39 años de edad, reside en Lolotique departamento de San Miguel, es profesor y vive con su familia, esposa y dos hijos de 8 y 4 años de edad, él trabaja como profesor en el centro escolar de Ciudad Barrios, donde labora de lunes a viernes desde hace 10 años.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en materiales de construcción ya que se encuentra remodelando su vivienda. Su compra será en Hierro, arena, cemento para construir unas paredes así también para instalar las ventanas de vidrio.
Este préstamo le ayudara a adquirir todo lo necesario para poder trabajar en su casa y realizar los cambios necesarios, ofreciéndole a su familia una vivienda cómoda y más confortable. Una de sus aspiraciones es continuar mejorando su vivienda y dedicarse a su trabajo ya que de este dependen sus hijos y del cual espera darles a ellos los estudios necesarios.
texts.en:
José Ezequías is 39 years old and lives in Lolotique, in San Miguel department.  He is a teacher and lives with his wife and two children aged 8 and 4.  He has worked as a teacher in Ciudad Barrios school for the past 10 years.  He works from Monday to Friday.

José Ezequías is currently requesting a loan to invest in buying building supplies since he is in the process of remodelling his home.  He will buy iron, sand and cement to build some walls and will also install glass windows.  This loan will help him to acquire everything he needs to work on his home and make necessary changes, thereby offering his family a more comfortable place to live.  One of José Ezequías' aspirations is to continue improving his home and to commit himself to his work since his children depend on it.  Through his work, he hopes to be able to provide them with a good education.

loans.use: To buy materials such as iron, sand, cement and windows

loans.name: Angel Miguel

texts.es:
Ángel de 25 años de edad, reside en Nueva Guadalupe, departamento de San Miguel, vive con sus padres y hermanos, se dedica al taller de estructuras metálicas desempeñándose desde hace 5 años, este oficio lo aprendió por un familiar y actualmente trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Ángel está reparando una pared de su vivienda, ya que se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como ladrillos, cemento, arena, piedra y hierro; con este préstamo espera cubrir los gastos que demanda el tener en buenas condiciones la casa donde comparte con su familia.
Su aspiración es continuar mejorando la vivienda, además de atender el taller con mucha dedicación realizando el trabajo con calidad para agradar a los clientes y contar con ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Ángel, 25 years old, lives in Nueva Guadalupe in the department of San Miguel. He lives with his parents and siblings and has worked in a metal structure workshop for 5 years. He learned this trade from a relative and currently works from Monday to Saturday. Ángel is fixing a wall in his house which has deteriorated, and for which he is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as bricks, cement, sand, stone, and iron. With this loan he hopes to cover the expenses necessary to keep the house he shares with his family in good condition.
His aspiration is to continue improving his home, as well as seeing to the workshop with a lot of dedication and doing a high quality job to please his customers and to be able to count on income for his family.

loans.use: The purchase of materials: bricks, cement, sand, stone, and iron

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more crates of drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy beads and other materials for crafts

loans.name: Maria Milagros

texts.es: Maria Milagros se dedica a la elaboración de productos químicos, inicio a este negocio hace 11 años, siempre le ha gustado esta actividad ya que lo aprendió por cuenta propia, ya que con el tiempo es que fue logrando obtener mucha más experiencia. La mayoría de sus clientes llegan a buscar sus productos ya que son muy deliciosos por la combinación de aroma que realizan. Ella decide realizar este crédito para la compra de químicos, colores, botellas, bolsas, estantes entre otras cosas. Sueña con mejorar su negocio y ampliarlo cada día más.
texts.en: Maria Milagros makes perfumes. She started this business 11 years ago and she has always enjoys this business. She has always liked it because she learned on her own. With time she has accumulated a great deal of experience. The majority of her clients look for products with beautiful scents produced by a combination of aromas. With this loan she expects to purchase perfumes, coloring agents, bottles, bags, stands, and other merchandise. Her dream is to improve her business and to make it grow more every day.

loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: Mamadou Khaly

texts.fr: Monsieur Mamadou KhaL. L. habite dans un des quartiers environnants de la localité de Camberene. Monsieur L. est informaticien de formation offre des prestations de service. Il a une expérience  de plus de plus de 10 ans dans cette activité. Il est membre de la caisse de Camberene  depuis mars 2005 et sollicite un prêt de 500 000 frs dans l but de renforcer son potentiel en ordinateur. Ainsi l’accroissement de ses gains lui permettra d’améliorer sa situation sociale.
texts.en: Mr. Mamadou KhaL. L. lives in a suburban district of Camberene. Mr. L. is computer scientists by education and he offers computer services. He has over 10 years of experience in this business. He has been a member of the Camberene fund since Marhc 2005, and he is seeking a loan of 500,000 in order to have a better computer equipment. The increased revenues will allow him to improve his socioeconomic standing.

loans.use: Bolstering his business capital

loans.name: Sonia Nohemi

texts.es:
Sonia de 26 años de edad, reside en Nueva Guadalupe, departamento de San Miguel, es soltera y vive con sus padres y hermanos, tiene un negocio de Ropa, el cual está ubicado frente al parque central de Chinameca un lugar muy cercado donde trabaja de lunes a sábado de hace ya 4 años.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: trajes, camisas, punteras, camisetas, short, pantalones, ella considera que con esta mercadería que logre comprar podrá abastecer los gustos de muchas personas que transitan el lugar y otros que son clientes frecuentes, espera aumentar el volumen de sus ventas y mantener en buenos niveles los inventarios.
Sueña con un negocio amplio, rentable y con muchos clientes, en su vida personal quiere a futuro formar su propio hogar con una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Sonia is 26 years old and lives in Nueva Guadalupe, in San Miguel department.  She is single and lives with her parents and siblings.  She has a clothes business which is located opposite Chinameca central park, a very popular area.  She has been working there, from Monday to Saturday, for four years.

Sonia is currently requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as dresses, shirts, toe caps, t-shirts, shorts and pants.  She believes that with this merchandise she will be able to appeal to the tastes of many people who pass by her stall and also her frequent customers.  She hopes to increase her sales volume and maintain a good stock level.  Sonia dreams of having a bigger, more profitable business, with a lot of customers.  Her dream for her personal life is to be able, in the future, to set up her own home with better financial security.

loans.use: To buy dresses, shirts, toe caps, t-shirts, shorts and pants

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio  A. es vecino  de  la Trinchera de Pital en Alajuela ,es conocido por ser una persona muy emprendedora.
Desde hace varios años decidió establecer su propio negocio, un taller de mecánico.
 Su negocio ha sido un éxito, sin embargo ya ni sus herramientas ni el espacio de su taller son suficientes para satisfacer la demanda de trabajo que tiene en este momento.
Es por eso que el necesita un préstamo de ₡300 000 (trescientos mil colones) para la compra de mas herramientas para su taller. Con el fin de brindarle un mejor servicio a sus  clientes.
El es socio de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Sergio A. lives in the same neighborhood as Trinchera de Pital in Alajuela. He is known to be a very enterprising person. 

Several years ago he decided to set up his own business - a repair shop.

His business has been a success and even though he doesn't have the tools or the space that he needs, his shop has been enough to satisfy the demand he currently observes.

He requests a loan of 300 000 (three hundred thousand colones) to purchase more tools for his shop, with the goal of providing his clients with better service. He is a member of the communal bank named Mujeres al Exito de la Trinchera de Pital, one of the 100 member organizations of Edesa (Kiva Field Partner) in Costa Rica.

loans.use: To purchase industrial tools.

loans.name: Carla Creisayda

texts.es:
Carla es socia del Banco Comunal Granito de Mostaza, tiene 20 años y es soltera. Carla es feriante viaja a las ferias de Niño Bamba los días viernes, los sábados a la feria de Paccha y los domingos a la feria de Huamanguilla. Carla antes vendía helados en las ferias y decidió vender especerías porque es mas rentable, está en Finca desde hace mas de un año, le gusta por la capacitaciones que recibe, le enseñan a como trabajar, a conocer sus derechos, le dan créditos puede ahorrar y sus ahorros ganan intereses. 
Carla solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en surtir su mercadería como: canela, orégano, clavo, detergentes, jabones, etc.
El sueño de Carla es poder tener una bodega en su casa y ya no viajar a las ferias, terminar sus estudios de computación y poder seguir sus estudios universitarios de contabilidad.
texts.en:
Carla is a member of the communal bank named Granito de Mostaza (meaning Little Grain of Mustard). She is 20 years old and she is single. Carla is a merchant who travels to the various fairs in Nino Bamba on Fridays. On Saturdays she travels to the fair in Paccha and on Sundays to the fair in Huamanguilla. Carla used to sell icecreams at the fairs but she decided to sell spices instead because it was more profitable. She has been a member of this group for more than a year and she enjoys taking part for the training she receives. She can learn how to manage their businesses, to know their rights, and they are granted loans and given the ability to save money. Their savings earn interest. 

Carla requuests a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise such as: cinnamon, oregano, cloves, detergents, soaps, etc. 

Carla's dream is to set up a convenience store in her house so that she will no longer need to travel to the fairs. She dreams of completing her studies in computers and to keep up her university studies in accounting.

loans.use: To purchase spices and soaps.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es socia del Banco Comunal Granito de Mostaza, tiene 37 años, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos. Rosa es panificadora, se dedica a la elaboración de panes chaplas, aprendió de ésta actividad desde muy niña pues su madre era panadera. Ahora se dedica a ésta actividad con su pareja, por el momento trabajan en un hormo alquilado, atienden a clientes fijos y distribuyen en algunas bodegas y tiendas. Rosa solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura entre otros para la elaboración de panes chapla.
A Rosa le gusta las reuniones de su Banco Comunal por las capacitaciones que recibe por parte de su promotora, le hace reflexionar, y también porque puede acceder a los créditos .
El sueño de Rosa es poder tener su propio horno, ampliar para elaborar otro tipo de panes y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank named Granito de Mostaza (meaning Little Grain of Mustard). She lives with her life partner and they have 3 children togther. She is a baker and she makes Peruvian flat breads. She learned this business as a young girl from her mother who was also a baker. She manages her business together with her partner and currently they use an oven that is rented.  They have a steady clientele and they also distribute to a few grocery stores and convenience stores. Rosa requests a loan to invest in the purchase of flour, yeast and other ingredients she needs to make flat breads. 

Rosa enjoys the meetings with her communal banks, especially for the training she receives from her facilitator because it makes her think, and for the access to loans. 

Rosa's dream is to have her own oven and to start making other types of breads. She also wants to see her children grow up to have careers.

loans.use: To purchase flour and yeast.

loans.name: Edy De Jesus

texts.es: Edy De Jesús tiene 50 años, como todo padre responsable, le gusta proporcionarle a su hijo lo más básico. Su negocio consiste en la venta de frijoles y leña, la ubicación de su negocio es en su propia vivienda, la mayoría de sus clientes son vecinos, amigos, familiares y público en general, siempre llegan a comprar sus productos pues son muy necesarios para los hogares nicaragüenses.  Siempre se ha caracterizado por tener un buen trato con sus clientes. El crédito es para la compra de materia prima en su negocio como leña y frijoles.
texts.en: Edy de Jesus is 50 years old, and like all other responsible parents, he wants to provide his son with the basic comforts. His business is the sale of beans and firewood. His business is located in his house and the majority of his clients are neighbors, friends, family, and the general public.  His clients come often to purchase products from him because they are the most commonly used in Nicaraguan homesteads. He has always been known for his excellent customer service. The loan will be used to purchase merchandise for his business, including firewood and beans.

loans.use: To purchase firewood and beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a chicken roaster.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es socia del Banco Comunal Granito de Mostaza, tiene 40 años y es soltera. Tiene una bodega en la que vende gas y aguas gaseosas. Ella solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercaderia para su negocio.
sonia está en Finca desde hace 2 ciclos, ingreso por la invitación de su prima y le gusta por la capacitaciones que recibe de la institución. En Finca aprendió a ahorrar a veces en la casa no se puede, le gusta porque se práctica mucho los valores, el compañerismo entre las socias.
Su sueño es poder ampliar su negocio, construir su casa y formar una familia.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the communal bank named Granito de Mostaza (meaning Little Grain of Mustard). She is 40 years old and she is single. She has a store from where she sells propane gas and soft drinks. She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise for her business. 

Sonia has been a member of Finca (Kiva Field Partner) for the past 2 cycles. She joined following an invitation from her cousin. She enjoys taking part for the training that she receives from the organization. It was through Finca that she learned to save money because sometimes at home it is not possible. She enjoys it for its values and for the collegiality among the members. 

Her dream is to expand her business, to build a house and to start a family.

loans.use: To purchase soft drinks and other merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YANAPAKUY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Crisiologo; el tiene 66 años de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; el socio tiene su empresa que brinda el servicio de comida el abastece a ciertas instituciones o comedores populares almuerzos o cenas ,el socio lleva años en este negocio del cual se siente contento ya  que mediante este negocio el socio saca a su familia adelante ,el socio es una persona bien optimista y desea continuar de esta forma ,el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa ella es quien cocina con la ayuda de algunos de sus hijos también tiene gente que trabaja para él y así pueden abastecer a todos sus clientes.

El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para su negocio como productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros más

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Crisiologo belongs to the Yanapakuy Communal Bank.  This bank is located in the Cusco district, which is in the Cusco province, Cusco department.

Crisologo, age 66, is married and has six children.  He has a business providing food service.  He provides lunches or dinners to certain institutions or popular dining rooms.  He has been in this business for years.  He is content because it is through this business that he gets his family ahead.

He is a pretty optimistic person, and he wishes to continue on in the same manner.  He works together with his wife.  She is the one who cooks, with help from some of their children.  He also has people who work for him.  That way they can supply all of their customers.

He is requesting the loan to buy supplies for his business.  He will buy basic needs products like rice, sugar, and milk, among others.  He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make all of his payments.

loans.use: To buy basic needs products like rice, sugar, and milk, among others for his business

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es:
Doña Rosa, tiene 48 años de edad, reside en Nueva Guadalupe departamento de San Miguel, vive con sus dos hijos de 22 y 20 años de edad, ella se dedica a destazar cerdos, venta de frutas y venta de pupusas, estos negocios los inicio hace 10 años, atendiéndolos de lunes a sábado.
Ella está necesitando de dinero para invertir al negocio, por lo que se ve en la situación de solicitar un préstamo para comprar mercadería como maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, tomates, también frutas como sandias, papaya, mangos además de cerdos para seguir comercializando su carne.
Este préstamo le será de mucha utilidad para el negocio ya que aumentara su inventario de productos que tendrá a disponibilidad para los clientes, atendiendo de una mejor manera. Su propósito es mantener en el mercado competente y fortaleciéndose cada día de lo mejor en mercadería, ayudando así a sus hijos para que puedan vivir de una mejor forma y se preparen para el futuro.
texts.en:
Rosa is 48 years old.  She lives in Nueva Guadalupe, in San Miguel department, with her two children aged 22 and 20.  Rosa's business is slaughtering pigs, selling fruit and selling pupusas (thick tortillas stuffed with a savory filling).  She has been in these businesses for 10 years and works from Monday to Saturday.

Rosa needs money to invest in her business.  She is requesting a loan so that she can buy merchandise such as corn, cooked pork paste, soft cheese, tomatoes; fruit such as watermelons, papaya, mangos, and also pigs so that she can continue selling their meat.  This loan will be very useful to Rosa since she will be able to increase her inventory and have more products available for her customers.  This will allow her to provide them with a better service.  Her goal is to remain competent in the market and to strengthen her business every day with the best merchandise, thereby helping her children to live better lives and prepare themselves for the future.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for preparing pupusas.  To buy fruit.

loans.name: Sidy

texts.fr: Monsieur Sidy N. est un jeune peintre de 32 ans qui habite dans un quartier situé a proximité de la localité de Camberene. En même temps aussi il exerce la vente de poulets. Monsieur N. s’active dans l’activité de peintre depuis plus de 10 ans déjà. Il est membre de la caisse de Camberene depuis juillet 2003. Il a déjà remboursé un prêt antérieur. Il sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs destiné à élargir  son activité d’élevage de poulets. Ce financement lui permettra de développer son activité et aussi d’accroitre ses revenus.
texts.en: Mr. Sidy N. is a young house painter, 32 years old, living in a neighborhood close to Camberene. His other line of business is selling chickens. He has been working as a painter for over 10 years. He has been a member of the Camberene credit association since July 2003. He has already repaid a previous loan. He is seeking a loan of 300,000 West African Francs to be used for   his chicken-raising business. This loan will allow him to grow his business and increase his revenues.

loans.use: Increasing working capital

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YANAPAKUY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Edwin; el tiene 29 años de edad y es soltero; el socio es biólogo de profesión el trabaja en un laboratorio particular lleva ya un buen tiempo en este trabajo del cual le trae muchas satisfacciones ya que está realizando las cosas que le gustan, el socio es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante, el socio está ahorrando ya que le gustaría poder  invertir en algún negocio o de repente en su maestría.

El socio solicita el préstamo para ahorrar y para utilizarlo en gastos menores para su uso como comida, pasajes entre otros más.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Yanapakuy". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, it belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

The member is Edwin, he is 29 years old and is single. He is a biologist by profession and works in a private laboratory. He has been doing this work for some time and it brings him much satisfaction since he is doing things that he likes. He is a very happy person and very eager to get ahead. He has been saving since he would like to invest in a business or in a master's degree. 

He is requesting this loan to save and to use it for minor expenses such as food and travel expenses among others. 

He is happy for this loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: To save and to use for minor expenses such as food and travel expenses.

loans.name: Juntas Si Podemos Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Juntas si Podemos inicia su quinto ciclo con 14 socias que tienen diferentes negocios, Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal, tiene 44 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos. Paulina tiene una tienda D. abarrotes en su casa, solicita un préstamo para invertir en L. compra D. arroz, azúcar, harina para surtir su mercadería.
Paulina está en Finca desD. hace cuatro ciclos, le gusta por las reuniones que tiene con sus compañeras D. banco y por las capacitaciones que reciben.
Su sueño es que su negocio siga prosperando y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en: The communal bank "Juntas si podemos" is beginning its fifth period with fourteen members of various businesses.  Paulina is one of the communal bank's members.  She is 44 years old, married, and has four children.  Paulina has a grocery store in her home and is taking out a loan to invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, and flour to stock her merchandise.  Paulina has been with Finca for four periods and likes the meetings she has with her companions in the bank as well as the trainings they receive.  Her dream is for her business continue to prosper and for her children become professionals.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, and flour.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “YANAPAKUY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ismael; el tiene 50 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de taller de mecánica él le da todo tipo de mantenimiento a los carros que le solicitan el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le sirvió para educar a sus hijos y hasta ahora el ayuda en lo que puede a su familia esta actividad se convirtió en su fuente de ingreso, el socio está feliz ya que este negocio le gusta mucho y desea continuar así.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la implementacion de su taller.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos
texts.en:
Sr. Ismael is member of the Communal Bank “Yanapakuy”, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He is 50 years old, in a common law marriage, and has four children. Ismael divides his time between daily activities and managing his repair business. He provides maintenances services for all types of automobiles. Ismael has been in business for several years, which has enabled him to provide an education for his children and a source of income for his family. He is very happy with his business and wants to continue with it. The loan he is requesting will be used to keep his auto repair shop in operation.

Ismael is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: Operating capital for his auto repair shop

loans.name: Rider Alexander

texts.es:
Rider, se dedica a destazar cerdos, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con sus padres y hermanos en Nueva Guadalupe departamento de San Miguel, su trabajo lo realiza de lunes a sábado desde hace 3 años.
Actualmente  él quiere construir en su vivienda un muro de contención ya que la zona donde está ubicada la casa, en temporada de lluvias existen deslaves lo que va erosionando la tierra y dañando parte del patio, la casa es familiar pero Rider quiere tenerla en mejores condiciones por lo solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales para llevar a cabo la construcción, la inversión la hará en cemento, arena y piedra.
Él espera hacer una buena administración del préstamo, dedicarse a su trabajo para poder cubrir los pagos de este crédito y seguir contribuyendo por mejorar la vivienda y en un futuro formar su propia familia.
texts.en:
Rider earns a living by butchering pigs. He is 28 years old and lives with his parents and siblings in Nueva Guadalupe in the Department of San Miguel. Rider has been working Monday through Saturday for three years.

Rider currently wants to build a retaining wall for his home since it is located in an area that experiences landslides during the rainy season. Land erosion has damaged part of the yard. The house belongs to his family, but Rider wants to have better living conditions. He is requesting this loan to buy materials so that he can proceed with the construction. Rider will invest in cement, sand, and stone.

He hopes to manage this loan very well. Rider dedicates himself to his job so that he can cover the payments for this loan and continue contributing to the home improvements. In the future, he hopes to start his own family.

loans.use: Purchase cement, sand, and stone to build a retaining wall

loans.name: Rufino De Jesus

texts.es:
El Senor Rufino V., es habitante de la Comarca El Coyolito, del Departamento de Esteli; es casado, de 68 anos de edad, tiene 3 hijos; Alcanzar un nivel de educacion no fue posible, debido a las condiciones economicas que su familia tenia en esos momentos.
Desde muy corta edad se dedico a las actividades de agricultura ayudando a sus padres, en la siembra de granos basicos.
Cuando murieron sus padres a el y a sus hermanos le quedo de herencia el terreno en donde sembraba con ellos; ahora el esta a cargo de eso.
Realizo este credito para cultivar 3/4 de Tomate, sobre todo para la compra de insumos; pues el dice que todo esta listo, e incluso ya tiene preparada la tierra y la semilla.
Su meta es poder tambien expandir sus negocios en la compra de ganado.
texts.en: Mr. Rufino V. lives in the El Coyolito region, in the Department of Esteli.  He is married, 68 years old, and has three children.  Getting an education was not possible due to his family's economic status at that time.  He has been working in farming since he was a little boy, helping his parents plant basic grains.  He and his siblings inherited the land they planted when his parents died and now he is in charge of it.  He is taking out this loan to cultivate 3/4 tomatos -- mostly to buy supplies.  He also says that everything is already; he has even prepared the earth and the seeds.  His goal is to be able to expand his business and buy cattle.

loans.use: To plant tomatoes.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria es socia del Banco Comunal Molecito de Covadonga, tiene 60 años, es madre soltera y tiene 6 hijos.
Se dedica ala venta de verduras. Victoria antes se dedicaba a la venta de cuyes y gallinas pero lo cambio por la venta de verduras surtidas en le Mercado Nery García Zarate, labor que realiza de lunes a domingo, compra las verduras a los mayorista. Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará en surtir su mercadería comprando verduras variadas.
Victoria está en Finca desde hace 2 ciclos, le gusta por los ahorros y por la capacitaciones que recibe.
Su sueño es que su negoció crezca.
texts.en: Victoria is a member of the communal bank "Molecito de Covadonga."  She is 60 years old and has six children.  She sells vegetables for a living.  Victoria used to sell guinea pigs and hens but switched to vegetables supplied by the Nery García Zarate market.  She works from Monday to Sunday buying wholesale vegetables.  She is taking out this loan to stock her merchandise by buy various vegetables.  Victoria has been in Finca for two periods and likes the savings and trainings she receives.  Her dream is to grow her business.

loans.use: To buy various vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Rodolfo

texts.es:
El Senor Jose V., es habitante de la comarca El Coyolito, del Municipio La Concordia, de Esteli; casado, no tiene hijos. A pesar de que las condiciones economicas no eran buenas, el hizo un sacrificio muy especial y logro llegar a 2 ano de secundaria.
Inicion desde muy pequeno, ayudando a su Papa, Don Rodolfo V., quien sembraba Repollo, Cebolla, el era ayudante de su papa en estas actividades y aprendio mucho, a pesar de que tambien debia estudiar.
Empezo a independizarse a los 18 anos, sembrando en sociedad 1 manzana de Repollo, y en esa epoca hubo perdida en las cosechas, pero el al menos logro sacar lo que habia invertido; pero esto no lo hizo darse por vencido, entonces volvio a sembrar repollo, y esta vez si logro obtener ganancias de U$ 1,000.00; claro que lo tenia que dividir entre su socio y el.
Luego decidio trabajar con un hermano y alquilaban un terreno a su abuelita, para trabajar con la familia; tambien se dedica al engorde Ganado, que ha ido comprando con las ganancias que le ha generado la siembra de Repollo y de Tomate.
Actualmente realizo el credito para el mantenimiento de 1 manzana de Tomates; espera obtener buenas ganancias de esta cosecha.
Entre sus planes esta comprar su propio terreno y comprar mas ganado.
texts.en:
Jose V. lives in El Coyolito region, in La Concordia, in Esteli.  He is married but does not have any children.  In spite of the fact that his economic means were not good, he made a very special effort and managed to reach his second year of high school.  José started out in farming by helping his dad, Rodolfo Valvidia, when he was very young.  His dad used to grow cabbages and onions.  José learned a lot in spite of the fact that he also had to study.

José started working independently at the age of 18, sowing just over 3 acres of cabbages together with a partner.  Back then he made some losses in his harvests but he at least managed to recoup what he had invested.  He didn't give up, however, but planted cabbages again.  This time he managed to make $1,000 US profit though, of course, he had to split the money between himself and his business partner.

José then decided to work with one of his brothers and they rented a plot of land from their grandmother so that they could work with the family.  José also raises livestock which he has been buying with the profits that he has made from his cabbage and tomato crops.

José has requested this loan to maintain nearly 3 acres of tomato crops.  He hopes to make good profits from this harvest.  In the future, he plans to buy his own plot of land and to buy more livestock.

loans.use: To sow tomatoes

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es:
Marvin A. Chávez, esta en unión libre y quiere comprar materiales para la construcción o arreglo de la parte trasera o cocina de su hogar, el es agricultor  y quiere darle a su familia un ambiente familiar más seguro y buenas condiciones de vida por lo cual quiso optar por el arreglo de parte trasera de su humilde hogar. Esto también se debe para brindar a su hogar una mayor seguridad de su casa y de sus bienes en su interior que tanto le han costado.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin A. Chávez lives with his common law wife.  He would like to buy materials to build or fix the rear part of his house (the kitchen).  He is a farmer and would like to provide his family with a safer family environment and good living conditions.  For this reason, he decided to fix the rear of his humble home.  This will also provide better security for his home and the possessions inside which he has worked so hard to acquire.

This is Marvin's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with easier repayment facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy materials to fix his house

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es:
Don Nelson P., tiene 40 anos de edad, vive en la comarca Palo Verde, en Pueblo Nuevo, Jinotega; casado con 2 hijos; su educacion es muy elemental, ya que solamente aprobo 1er grado de primaria.
Joven emigro a nuesro pais hermano de Costa Rica, ahorro un poco de dinero y decidio regresar a su pais, para dedicarse a la siembra de hortalizas y de granos basicos.
El comenzo con esfuerzos propios, ha sido siempre muy trabajador y muy esforzado.
El solicito este credito, para compra de Insumos y pago de mano de obra en la siembra de tomates; es decir que es para capital de trabajo.
Desea seguir dedicandose a la siembra de hortalizas y poco a poco mejorar su vivienda, ya que es muy humilde actualmente.
Todo lo que el hace es para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia,y es algo que siempre ha hecho.
texts.en:
Mr. Nelson Ponzo is 40 years old and he lives in the community of Palo Verde in Pueblo Nuevo, Jinotega. He is married and he has 2 children. His education is very basic; he only passed grade 1. 

As a young man he immigrated our neighbor country of Costa Rica. He saved some money and decided to return to his homeland to cultivate vegetables and basic grains. 

He started out on his own, and he has always been hard working and willing to expend every effort.

He requested this loan to purchase materials and to hire help to maintain his tomato plantation. That is to say, his loan will be used as working capital. 

He wishes to keep up with his vegetable plantations and to slowly improve his house. It is a very humble house. 

Everything that he does is done to improve the quality of life for his family. It is something that he has always done.

loans.use: To cultivate tomatoes.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en: Doris J. S. runs a small, but well organized, kiosk in front of her house. She is assisted by her two children, a boy and a girl, after their school day is over. Her husband works in a local garage. Doris requires a loan as she is faced with the task of raising capital in order to increase her stock. Doris' goal is to increase her sales. Most of her customers have to walk half a mile to her stand to get most of their basic commodities. Doris is hard working and thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more food items

loans.name: Sokhna

texts.fr: Madame Sokhna N. habite dans la localité de Camberene. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce  depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle gère une cantine située non loin du guichet d’U-IMCEC  ou elle vend des tissus de différentes sortes. Elle est membre du guichet depuis aout  2004.Elle sollicite un prêt de 300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de tissus destinés a renforcer son stock .Ce financement lui permettra d’élargir d’avantage son activité, de renforcer ses bénéfices et de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Ms. Sokhna N. lives in the town of Camberene. She has been advancing in commerce for over ten years. She runs a stall located not far from the U-IMCEC branch where she sells fabrics of all kinds.  She has been a member of the branch since August 2004. Sokhna is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs to buy some cloth for bolstering her stock of merchandise. This financing will enable her to expand her business further, to boost her profits, and to meet the needs of her family better.

loans.use: Bolstering her working capital

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles S. started Black Diamond Services in May 2005. Black Diamond Services sells and maintains custom computer control systems that enable customers to operate household equipment through automated systems. For example, customers could operate their outdoor lighting or security cameras through computer systems. These automated systems also enable customers to access this equipment from outside their homes. Black Diamond Services specializes in customizing the features of these automated control systems to a customer’s needs and specifications. 

Charles employs between 2-10 part-time employees, the number depending on the contracts available. He is married with three children. Charles began his business in response to customer requests for high quality and good customer service. This led him to believe that if he sold quality products, backed them up with superior customer service, and paid attention to customers’ needs, then customers would be willing to pay a premium price for a premium product and service. Charles believes that his business has been successful because of how well he has done in these areas. That 99.9% of his new customers were referred by existing customers is testament to that. 

This loan helped Charles to purchase new computer control equipment so he could expand his offerings of automated control systems. It is also his third loan and the loans have helped him purchase new equipment and tools as well as increase sales. It is very important that Charles expands his business because he has seen an increased demand for his services from new customers. Without the loans, he would not have been able to expand quickly enough and would have lost those new customers.

loans.use: New computer control equipment to expand offerings of automated control systems

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Maura casada, mujer trabajadora, inicio su propio negocio para apoyar a su esposo con los gasto de la casa, tiene una pulpería en donde también tiene ropa en venta desde hace un tiempo, no se le ha presentado dificulta alguna ya que lo inicio con fondo de ahorros propios y ha ido creciendo mediante el apoyo del financiamiento. Como planes a futuro es seguir incrementando las ventas. El préstamo que solicitad será invertido en la compra de granos básico, ropa para dama, caballero y niño, artículos escolares, productos enlatados y otros. Generandole mayores ventas, mayores ganancia.
texts.en:
Maura is married and a hardworking woman. She started her own business in order to help her husband with the household expenses. Maura has a store where she also sells seasonal clothing. She has not had any difficulties since she started out using her own savings and has grown with the help of loans. Her plans for the future include continuing to increase her sales.

The loan she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of basic grains, clothing (for women, men, and children), school supplies, canned goods, and other products. She hopes to generate better sales and earn more income.

loans.use: Purchase a variety of products to sell

loans.name: Martha Francina

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Masaya, del Departamento de Masaya, la señora Martha Francina R. O. se dedica a la labor de Cajera en ENACAL desde hace tres años. Es madre soltera y con dos hijos menores de edad a quienes les trata de cubrir todas sus necesidades.

Una de las necesidades en la que se enfrenta la señora R. O. es la de mejorar su vivienda, debido a esto ha decidido el solicitar un crédito en las Oficinas de CEPRODEL el cual tiene como fin el comprar distintos materiales de construcción para llegar a satisfacer su necesidad y de esta forma poder darle un techo digno y con mayor seguridad a sus hijos.

La señora siente que con este cambio en su hogar le estaría protegiendo la salud de sus hijos ya que prefiere hacer estos cambios antes que entre la temporada de invierno.
texts.en:
For three years, Martha Francina R. O. has been working as a cashier at ENACAL (Nicaraguan water supply and sewerage company), in the town of Masaya, in Masaya department.  She is a single mother who has two dependent children.  She tries to meet all their needs.

One of the needs that Mrs R. O. has is that of improving her home.  For this reason, she has decided to request a loan from CEPRODEL's offices so that she can purchase the building supplies that she needs to meet her needs.  In this way, she will be able to provide her children with a decent home and better safety.

Mrs R. O. feels that this work on her home will protect her children's health.  She would prefer to carry out the work before the winter comes.

loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Las Vecinas Group

texts.es:
Las Vecinas es un grupo solidario de Credituyo en su primer ciclo formado por 7 mujeres. Ellas pusieron ese nombre al grupo porque todas viven en la misma colonia, muy cerca unas de otras. 
Martha es una de las mujeres del grupo. Ella vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en la colonia Nuevo Escobedo. Ella tiene una hija de 13 años y un hijo de 4. Ella tiene un puesto de tacos en el cual trabaja junto con su esposo para poder mantener a la familia. Los tacos se llaman “Los Sureños”,  y comenzaron hace 8 años en un puesto cerca de su casa. Los tacos que vende son de carne asada, puerco, quesadillas con carne, y además también venden hamburguesas. Ella pidió el préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio y seguir vendiendo continuamente y así que sus clientes sigan contentos . Martha quiere con sus ganancias seguir apoyando a la educación de su hija que estudia la secundaria y nos comento que es el primer lugar de su clase.
texts.en:
'Las Vecinas' (The Neighbors) is a Credituyo community bank which has seven female members and is entering its first loan cycle.  The women gave the group this name because they all live in the same neighborhood, very close to each other.

Martha is one of the group's members.  She lives with her husband and two children in Nuevo Escobedo neighborhood.  She has a 13 year-old daughter and a 4 year-old son.  Martha has a taco stall where she works together with her husband in order to support her family.  The tacos are called “Los Sureños”.  She started selling 8 years ago in a location near her home.  She sells roasted meat and pork tacos, quesadillas with meat and burgers.  

Martha requested this loan to invest in her business so that she could continue selling her products and keep her customers happy.  She would like to use her profits to continue supporting her daughter's education.  Her daughter is currently in high school and she tells us that she is top of her class.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her taco stall

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es: Juliana casada, mujer emprendedora, trabajadora tiene su negocio de venta de tortilla, como proyecto es  mejorando la infraestructura de sus vivienda, se le ha presentado dificultades para cumplir su proyecta como son las ventas bajas que se le dio en el año, inicio con fondos propio y por la situación de generar un ingreso mas para la casa.  El negocio está en su casa de habitación y requiere algunas mejorar. El préstamo será invertido en la infraestructura como es la compra de cemento, bloques, arena, hierro, colosos, alambre. Para levantar la pared del baño. Obteniendo comodidad y mejor hábito de salud.
texts.en: Juliana is an enterprising and hard-working married woman who has a business selling tortillas.  She has been carrying out a project, improving the infrastructure of her home.  She has faced difficulties in completing her project as sales have been low over the last year.  Juliana started the project with her own funds in order to generate additional income for her home.  Her business is located in her home and she needs to make some improvements.  Her loan money will be invested in the infrastructure of her home.  She will buy cement, blocks, sand, iron and wire in order to put up a wall in the bathroom.  This will provide her with comfort and better hygiene.

loans.use: To buy building supplies

loans.name: Cascabeles Group

texts.es:
La señora Tomasa Sánchez P., vive en Tecpatan Estado de Chiapas México, es madre soltera con cinco hijos  quienes ya están casados y son su razón de seguir adelante.
El préstamo solicitado lo invierte en la compara de ingredientes para la elaboración de comidas que vende  en el mercado, lleva con esta actividad  once años en donde la va bien ya que le ha  dejado buenos ingresos.

        Desde hace once años se dedica a esta actividad ya que para sacar adelante a sus hijos tenia que tener un trabajo en el cual  le diera buen resultado para salir adelante con su  familia y gracias adiós lo ha logrado.
    
       De lo que le queda  de su venta en el día  compra mas  ingredientes que se le terminan y  así su negocio se baya incrementado día a  día, como también  tener  de manera puntual sus pagos que ha solicitado.

       Desea que con este pequeño trabajo  siga adelante hasta que dios le preste vida, también comprar cosas que le hacen falta en su casa.

       El grupo se llama cascabeles y se integra de tres señoras cada una con diferente actividad, la razón del nombre es por que cuando se formo el grupo eran las fiestas navideñas.

       María Jiménez Sánchez: invertirá el préstamo en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de tamales, como son: carne, pasas, aceite, maza, entre otros.
     
       Tomasa Sánchez P.: invertirá el préstamo en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de comidas, como son: carne. Mariscos y verduras.

       Rosa del Carmen Gómez Pérez: invertirá el préstamo en la compra de ingredientes para la elaboración de embutidos (chorizo), como son: carne, chile ancho, tomillo, entre otros.
texts.en:
Tomasa Sánchez P. lives in Tecpatan in the state of Chiapas, México.  She is a single mother of 5 children, who are already married and who are her reason to continue to press ahead.  She will use this loan to buy ingredients to make the food that she sells in the market.  She has been carrying out this type of work for 11 years, and it is going well since it has allowed her to make a good income.  

She started with this business 11 years ago, since she needed to provide for her children.  She had to have a job that would give her good results so that she could get ahead with her family, and thanks to God she has managed to do this.

With the money from her daily sales, she buys the ingredients that she has run out of, and in this way her business grows gradually, day by day.  With these funds she also makes the payments on time for the loan that she has requested.  

She hopes that with this small job she can continue to get ahead as long as God grants her life and buy some things that she needs for her home.

This group is called "Cascabeles," (Jingle Bells) and is made up of 3 women who each have their own business.  The reason for the name is that when the group formed it was during the Christmas season.  

María Jiménez Sánchez will invest the loan in the purchase of ingredients to make tamales, such as: meat, raisins, cooking oil, cornmeal, etc.

Tomasa Sánchez P. will invest the loan in the purchase of ingredients to make food, such as: meat, seafood and vegetables.

Rosa del Carmen Gómez Pérez will invest the loan in the purchase of ingredients to make sausages, such as: meat, ancho chiles, thyme, and other items.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food, such as: meat, seafood and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy building supplies

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa D. habite à Camberene depuis plusieurs années. C’est dans le secteur de l’élevage de moutons qu’il évolue depuis prés de 50 ans. Il est sociétaire au guichet de Camberene depuis octobre 2003. Il sollicite un prêt de 200 000 frs dans le but d’acheter quelques moutons qui seront prévus pour la vente. L’objectif de Monsieur D. est de développer son activité et renforcer ses revenus afin  d’’améliorer les conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Moussa D. has been living in Camberene for many years. He has been involved in sheep breeding for nearly 50 years. He became a member of the Camberene branch in October 2003. 

He is seeking a 200,000F loan to buy a few sheep for resale. His goal is to expand his business and bolster his income in order to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To increase his working capital

loans.name: Francis Iveth

texts.es: La señora Francis Iveth tiene 34 años, es soltera y posee 2 hijos, menores de edad. La señora tiene un negocio peculiar, ya que ella posee un cyber, venta de cosméticos ubicado en su casa de habitación, sin embargo su negocio. Tiene 2 años de dedicarse a este negocio, el cual dio inicio debido a la falta de empleo que hay en nuestro país, por lo que recurrió a establecer un negocio, ahora posee más computadoras, por lo que decidió establecer el pequeño cyber. Su crédito será invertido en la compra de papelería y cosméticos además que desea comprar algunos consumibles de su lugar de trabajo. El sueño siempre ha sido brindarle una buena condición económica a la vida de su hijo, el cual pretende lograr invirtiéndole más a su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Francis Iveth is 34 years old, single and has 2 minor children.  She has a peculiar business running a home based internet cafe and selling cosmetics.  She has 2 years of experience in this business which she started because of the lack of employment in her country.  Now that her small internet cafe is established she has more computers.  

She will use the loan to buy stationary and cosmetics as well as consumables for her business.  Her dream has always been to provided her children with the best economic conditions which is why she is investing more in her business.

loans.use: stationary, cosmetics, consumables

loans.name: Huitzililla Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Huitzililla, se encuentra localizado en la comunidad de Huitzililla, Cd. Ayala, en el Estado de Morelos, México. Está conformado por 5 integrantes que se conocen y son vecinos, los integrantes son la señora Cruz P. Sánchez y va a comprar con su préstamo perfumes y cosméticos para surtir sus pedidos, la señora Margarita B. G. va a comprar aceite, refrescos, azúcar etc. Para surtir su tienda de abarrotes, la señora Maribel C. Sánchez va a comprar zapatos para surtir sus pedidos, la señorita Maricela C. P. va a comprar catálogos para surtir su primeros pedidos e iniciar su negocio de venta por catalogo, el joven Santiago V. B. va a comprar refrescos por caja para iniciar su negocio. La señora Maribel C. Sánchez tiene 33 años de edad estudio hasta el 3er. año de secundaria tiene su certificado, ella es casada su esposo trabaja en el campo rento una tierra y sembró cebolla y tiene 2 hijos Ismael tiene 11 años estudia el 6º. Año de primaria y Joaquín tiene 4 años. La señora Maribel tiene su negocio de venta de zapatos, cosméticos, lencería por catalogo, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar zapatos y surtir sus pedido de zapatos, ella ofrece a sus clientes zapatos, ropa, cosméticos, lencería, este negocio lo inicio hace 2 años, ella le ayudaba a vender a su cuñada ya después se compro los catálogos y comenzó a vender, ella surtió sus pedido con un guardadito primero empezó con una tanda que le dieron ya después con el préstamo lo invirtió, su negocio es ambulante va de casa en casa ofreciendo sus productos, su negocio es importante y especial porque si quiere unos zapatos para ella o sus hijos se los dan más baratos le dan descuento, la parte favorita de su negocio es cuando reparte el pedido porque algunos clientes le pagan al contado y otros le dan la mitad los hombres son buenos pagadores, ella recuerda cuando se gano un paquete de lencería por tener buenas ventas cada mes y lo logro por varios meses y le dieron su premio su paquete de lencería, ella tiene muchos clientes hombres, mujeres, muchachas cuando hay clausuras o desfiles le compran mas los zapatos parque lleven el mismo modelo, su negocio es popular por la marca del zapato que es muy reconocida, los desafíos que enfrenta su negocio es que da los zapatos en pagos y algunas personas ya no le pagan, la competencia que enfrenta su negocio es que hay muchas muchachas y señoras que venden por catalogo también vende de otras marcas, las ganancias del negocio las invierte compra mas zapatos, la señora Maribel está planeando ampliar su negocio surtirse más de todo de cosméticos, lencería, ropa y zapatos y lo piensa lograr con los prestamos. Su negocio ha ayudado a su familia cuando su esposo no tiene ingresos de ahí toma para la comida y los gastos, las mejorías que desea hacer a su vivienda son los baños y construir otra recamara, sus planes y esperanzas son seguir adelante con el negocio seguir vendiendo, ella está feliz con el préstamo que le dieron porque va surtir su negocio lo que le pidan lo va a comprar, las mejoras que desea para sus hijos son darles más estudios que no le falte nada y este préstamo le va a ayudar va a invertirlo en mercancía y con las ganancias, Los integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “gracias por ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan porque  sin su ayuda no podríamos salir  adelante.” Huitzililla es un pueblo cálido, hay campo, siembran cebolla, sorgo, maíz, Celebran al patrón del pueblo Santo Tomas el 21 de Diciembre, hay bautizos, primeras comuniones, procesión, corrida de toros, y brinco de chínelos.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is called Huitzililla, and it is located in the community of Huitzililla, in the State of Morelos. It's composed of 5 members who they know well and are neighbors. The members are Margarita who will buy oil, soft drinks, sugar, etc., to supply her grocery store; Maribel who will buy shoes to fill orders; the young Santiago who will buy soft drinks by the case to begin his business; and Maricela who will buy catalogs to fill her first requests and begin her catalog sales business. 

The young Maribel, who is 33 years old, studied up to the 3rd year of secondary and has her diploma. She is married and her husband works in the countryside, renting land and sowing onions. They have 2 children; Ismael is 11 years old and in the 6th grade in primary school, and Juaquin who is 4 years old. Maribel sells shoes, cosmetics, and lingerie by catalog. She is requesting a loan to buy shoes so she can fill shoe orders. She offers her customers shoes, clothing, cosmetics, and lingerie. 

When the business began some 2 years ago, initially, she helped her sister-in-law with sales. Later, Maribel bought catalogs and began to sell. Maribel began cautiously, with a selection she was offered and an initial loan. Her business is mobile; she goes from house to house, offering her products.  Keeping her business is important and special because if she wants some shoes for herself or her children, she provides them cheaper and con provide a discount.  Her favorite part of the business is when the customers pay! Some pay all in cash, others pay half down. Men are the best at paying. She remembers being awarded a packet of lingerie for having good sales each month. She has many customers: men, women, and girls. When there are closing ceremonies and parades, they buy more shoes. Their desire to have the same model makes her business popular; her brand is well-recognized. 

The challenge that faces her business is that she offers shoes on payments and some people don't pay. The competition her business confronts is that many girls and women who sell from catalogs sell other brands. Maribel invests her earnings to buy more shoes; she plans to expand her business by providing cosmetics, lengerie, chothes, as well as shoes, and she hopes to do this with loans.

Her business has helped her family when her husband couldn't provide income. From the earnings, she provides food and expenses. She wants to make improvements to her house, mainly the baths and building another bedroom. Her plans and hopes are to continue ahead with the business and keep on selling. Maribel is happy with this loan because she can supply her business with what people order. What she wants for her children is to provide schooling so that they will lack nothing. And this loan will help.

The group members wish to say to Kiva and Fundacion Realidad “Thanks for helping people who have needs because without your help we would not be able to get ahead.”

Huitzililla is a warm village with its countryside sown in onions, sorghum, and corn. They celebrate the day of their patron saint, St. Thomas, on the 21st of December; there are baptisms, first communions, processions, the running of bulls, and other ceremonies.

loans.use: TO BUY SHOES TO FILL CATALOG ORDERS AND OTHER MERCHANDISE

loans.name: Richard Paul

texts.es:
EL Sr. Richard Paul Chávez P. es soltero, no tiene carga familiar. Vive en casa de sus padres. Tiene un negocio de Optica y tiene diéz años de experiencia en el negocio. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. 
Está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de monturas para damas, caballeros y así poder diversificar sus productos y obtener mayor rentabilidad para llevar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Richard Paul Chávez P. is single and has no dependents.  He lives in his parent's home.  He has a business selling eyeglasses; he has 10 years of experience in this business.  He has good work and personal references.

He is requesting a loan to buy eyeglass frames for men and women so that he can diversify his products and obtain better profits, which will enable him to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: working capital to buy frames for his eyewear business

loans.name: Martha De Fátima

texts.es:
En las Oficinas de ENACAL del municipio de Masaya, del Departamento de Masaya labora la señora Martha de Fátima T. C. desde hace 4 años como conserje, con este humilde y digno salario la señora sufraga los gastos de sus tres menores hijos de los que provee de educación, sustentos y otros.

En estos momentos la señora T. C. no quiere perder la oportunidad de iniciar un negocio en su casa de habitación por el cual ella está tomando la decisión de visitar las oficinas de CEPRODEL a solicitar un crédito y de esta forma dar inicio a sus sueños.

Cabe mencionar que la señora tiene expectativas que con este negocio nuevo que inicie podrá darles un mejor nivel de vida a sus menores y forjarle un futuro digno y provechoso.
texts.en:
Martha de Fátima T. C. has worked for the past four years as a caretaker at the ENACAL offices in the municipality of Masaya within the department of Masaya. With this humble and decent salary, she defrays the costs for her three young children’s education, food, and other items.

At this time, Ms. T. C. does not want to miss the opportunity to start a business in her house. This is why she is making the decision to visit the CEPRODEL offices to request a loan to begin her dreams.

It is worth mentioning that she expects that with this new business, she will be able to provide her children with a better quality of life and to create a decent and profitable future for herself.

loans.use: Investment in a new business

loans.name: Lester Antonio

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Masaya del Departamento de Masaya se encuentra ubicada una empresa que se llama ENACAL en la que labora el señor Lester Antonio C. M., como  Inspector de Campo desde hace 3 años.

Este señor es casado, con un núcleo familiar de 2 personas (su esposa y un hijo menor de edad), actualmente quiere realizar ampliación y construcción de una habitación y un baño, esto para brindarle una mejor condición  de vida ya que quiere que su familia esté cómoda en su hogar.

Cabe mencionar que los sueños de este señor para con su familia prácticamente es ir mejorando las condiciones de su casa para darle un hogar digno.
texts.en:
In the Municipality of Masaya within the Department of Masaya, there is a company named ENACAL, and this is where Lestor Antonio C. M. has worked as a field inspector for the past three years.

He is married and has a 2-person nuclear family (his wife and a young son). He currently wants to expand and build a bedroom and a bathroom in order to provide better living conditions, as he wants his family to be comfortable in their home.

It is worth mentioning that his dream for his family is to improve the condition of their house to give them a decent home.

loans.use: Construction and expansion of a bedroom and a bathroom

loans.name: Cristobal De Jesus

texts.es: Cristóbal De Jesús tiene 49 años, el tiene 2 hijos menores que están a su cargo. Por lo que su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de triciclo taxi, pues tiene más de 3 años de dedicarse a esta actividad para él es muy importante ofrecer un buen servicio ya que así obtiene más clientes. Todos los días el se preocupa por proporcionarle a su familia lo más necesario en su hogar, el es un hombre que disfruta de salir todos los días a los diferentes lugares que sus mismos clientes lo conducen.
texts.en: Cristóbal de Jesús is 49 years old and has two young children under his care.  This is why his job is providing taxi service with a three-wheeled vehicle.  He has been in this business for more than three years and it is very important for him to offer good service, as that is how he gets more customers.  Every day, he worries about providing his family with the most necessary items in his house.  He is a man that enjoys going out every day to the different places that his customers have him go.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Evelyn Scarlet

texts.es: Evelyn se dedica a brindar el servicio de videos juegos. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que desde joven le ha gustado trabajar y salir adelante debido ya que tiene 2 hijos menores de edad, ellos le ayudan a administrar su negocio pues algunas veces quien atiende a sus clientes son sus hijos. Ella atiende todos los días desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las nueve de la noche, es por eso que siempre está pendiente de los juegos que le solicitan. El financiamiento es para la compra de controles, discos, televisores entre otros.
texts.en: Evelyn works providing video games service and has had this business for more than three years.  Since she was young, she has liked to work and get ahead due to the fact that she has two young children.  They help her to manage the business and sometimes, it is her children who tend to the customers.  She opens the business every day from 9am to 9pm and this is why she is always waiting for the games that they request from her.  The loan is for the purchase of controls, disks, and televisions, among other items.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Guisela

texts.es:
GuiseL. es socia del Banco Comunal Mollecito D. Covadonga, tiene 22 años y es conviviente. GuiseL. se dedica a L. venta D. ropa para damas caballeros y niños, que lo venD. en Pacaycasa, aprendió D. L. venta D. ropas D. su hermana, con éste es el segundo ciclo que está en Finca ingreso por L. invitación D. una vecina.
GuiseL. solicita un préstamo que será para invertirlo en surtir mercadería para su ferretería que está abriendo en su casa. 
A GuiseL. le gusta Finca porque pueD. ahorrar, les enseñan y se practican los valores. Su sueño es que crezca su ferretería.
texts.en:
GuiseL. is a member of the communal bank "Mollecito D. Covadonga."  She is 22 years old and lives with a partner.  GuiseL. has a business selling clothing for men, women and children in Pacaycasa.  She learned to sell clothing from her sister.  This is her second loan cycle with Finca.  She joined the organization because of an invitation from a neighbor.

GuiseL. requests a loan that she will use to stock up on merchandise for a hardware store that she is opening in her house.  GuiseL. likes Finca because she can save, and because they teach and practice values.  Her dream is for her hardware business to grow.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for a hardware store

loans.name: Yaseli

texts.es:
Yaseli es socia del Banco Comunal Mollecito de Covadonga, tiene 22 años, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo. Se dedica a la venta de ropa, para damas, caballeros, niños. Yaseli tiene un puesto en el Mercado de Covadonga, lo de la venta de ropas de vestir lo aprendió de sus padres, ingresos al Banco Comunal por invitación de su mamá. Yaseli solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de prendas de vestir para surtir su mercadería.
Su sueño es que su negocio crezca y poder dar una buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Yaseli is a member of the Communal Bank “Mollecito de Covadonga”. She is 22 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child. Yaseli sells clothing for women, men, and children. She has a stand at the Covadonga Market. Yaseli learned how to sell clothes from her parents. She joined the Communal Bank after being invited by her mother.
