Yaseli is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of clothing so that she can restock her inventory. Her dreams include seeing her business grow and providing a good education for her child.

loans.use: Purchase a variety of clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase lipsticks, powders, purses, and shoes

loans.name: Miriam Oneida

texts.es:
la sra. Miriam Oneida O. E. se dedica al comercio, cuenta con un puesto en el cual vende varios productos y esta ubicado en la Terminal de Buses de Jutiapa Jamastran, el crecimiento de su negocio es notable y esto debido a la buena atención que brinda a sus clientes y por la administración que le da al mismo.

Doña Miriam esta casada y de su matrimonio tiene 3 hijos los cuales dependen en su totalidad de ellos; pero el esposo de la Sra. Ordóñez migro hace varios años a los EE.UU. en busca de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ya que ellos no tenían casa donde vivir y desde que su esposo llego a dicho país se propuso la meta de construir su vivienda, misma que ya esta avanzada en mas de un 80% y según lo manifestado por ella su esposo solo termina la construcción de la casa y se regresa de dicho país para poder criar a sus hijos juntos. 
En la actualidad la Sra. O. no cuenta con el capital de trabajo suficiente para surtir mas su negocio. 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de  manzanas, tomates, chiles, papas, cebollas, galletas, sopas, jugos, churros, rasuradoras, naranjas, vinagre, frijoles en bolsa, pastas, confites. desea tener mas surtido su negocio y con mas inventario.
texts.en:
Mrs. Miriam Oneida O. E. is a businesswoman. She has a stall in which she sells various products, located in the bus terminal in Jutiapa Jamastran.  Her business has grown noticeably, owing to the good attentions of her customers and her own administration of the business.  

Doña Miriam is married and has 3 children who are totally dependent on them; however, her husband left for the United States some years ago in an attempt to improve their quality of life, since they didn't have a home in which to live.  Once her husband arrived in the US, he proposed that they construct a home, which is now more than 80% complete.  She says that when the house is finished, her husband will return from the US so that they can raise their children together.  

Currently, Mrs. O. does not have sufficient business capital to help her business grow.  She would use the loan to buy apples, tomatoes, peppers, potatoes, onions, cookies, soups, juices, chips, razors, oranges, vinegar, bagged beans, pasta, and candy.  She wants to her business to be better stocked and to increase her inventory.

loans.use: To buy apples, tomatoes, peppers, potatoes, onions, cookies, soups, juices, chips, razors, oranges, vinegar, bagged beans, pasta and candy.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lucia Ramona

texts.es: Lucia Ramona su negocio es la compra y venta de ropa.  Esta no es la primera vez que realiza créditos, pues han sido satisfactorios para ella. Desde hace más de 21 años que se dedica a este negocio. Lucia dio inicio a este medio de vida por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar. Ella siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer muy responsable y disfruta de interactuar con sus clientes. Ella solicita este crédito que será destinado para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, shorts y trajes.
texts.en:
Lucia Ramona has a business that involves buying and selling clothes. This is not the first time she has received loans and she has been satisfied with them. Lucia started this business more than 21 years ago because she needed to cover her household expenses. She has always been known for being a responsible woman and enjoys interacting with her customers.

Lucia is requesting this loan to purchase trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, and suits.

loans.use: Purchase trousers, shirts, skirts, shorts, and suits

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz forma parte del banco comunal “Rayito de Sol” perteneciente a la ciudad de San Bernardo. Ella prepara y vende comida rápida, como empanadas, pastel de choclo, pan amasado, berlines, helados y bebidas, en su casa, por encargos (excepto los  helados y las bebidas), desde hace más de 20 años. Cuando comenzó con su negocio, solo vendía pan amasado cocido a leña. Ahora gracias a otra institución en la que participó y a Fondo Esperanza,  cuenta con los implementos necesarios para facilitar su trabajo, como un horno industrial, una congeladora, una batidora y moldes entre otras cosas. 
Luz tiene muchos clientes frecuentes. Los días viernes vende colaciones en el trabajo de su hijo mayor y desde marzo a diciembre vende berlines en  kioscos de varios colegios,  además todos los fines de semana tiene pedidos para la hora de almuerzo.
Con este préstamo arreglará su cocina y comprará materiales e ingredientes para cocinar sus productos.
Ella vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos solteros, todos mayores de edad y quienes trabajan de manera dependiente. Sin embargo cuando ellos tienen sus días libres ayudan a Luz en preparar sus encargos y también en entregarlos.
El sueño de Luz es tener una amasandería y un kiosco en su misma casa.
Para Luz los préstamos de Fondo Esperanza han sido un gran apoyo para su negocio, sobre todo cuando sus ventas han sido bajas. También disfruta mucho el compartir con sus compañeras de grupo y la guía que recibe para llevar bien su negocio de parte de su asesora de Fondo Esperanza.
San Bernardo es una ciudad, ubicada  a 18 km. en línea recta hacia el sur desde la plaza de armas de Santiago (capital de Chile). Es conocida como la capital del folklore, debido a que cada año, en  enero, se realiza el "Festival Internacional del Folklore", un evento en el que las raíces del país se dan cita y se reúnen  agrupaciones musicales de toda Sudamérica. También se desarrolla la "Feria de Artesanía Tradicional", en la que participan tanto artesanos chilenos como de otros países cercanos. Luego en abril se realiza el  evento “Abril cuecas Mil” que consiste en hacer bailar cueca (baile tradicional chileno) a toda la comuna
texts.en:
Luz is part of the "Rayito de Sol" (Little Ray of Sun) community bank in the city of San Bernardo. For more than 20 years, Luz has prepared and sold fast food such as empanadas, pastel de choclo (a traditional baked fresh ground corn and meat pie), Chilean kneaded bread, berlines (custard-filled pastries), ice cream and drinks from her home. She also makes deliveries.  When Luz first started her business, she only sold bread baked in a wood-fired oven. Now, thanks to Fondo Esperanza and another microfinance institution she used to participated in, Luz has equipment that makes her work easier such as an industrial oven, freezer, electric mixer, and bread pans, among other things.

Luz has many loyal customers. On Fridays she sells lunches at the office where her oldest child works, and from March to December she sells berlines at various schools. In addition, she has lunch orders to prepare every weekend. With this loan Luz will fix her stove and buy materials and ingredients to cook her food products.

She lives with her husband and 3 children. All her children are older and working; none have married yet. On days when they aren't working, Luz's children help her with her cooking and deliveries. 

Luz's dream is to have a bakery and store front right in her home. The loans from Fondo Esperanza have helped her business greatly, especially when her sales were low. Luz also enjoys the support of her group members and business guidance she receives from her Fondo Esperanza advisor. 

San Bernardo is a city located 28 km directly south of la plaza de armas in Santiago, the capital of Chile. It's known as the folklore capital of Chile because of the International Festival of Folklore held there every January. At the festival the country's traditions are highlighted and musical groups from all over South America gather. San Bernardo also holds the Festival of Traditional Crafts, attended equally by Chilean artisans and artisans from nearby countries. In April, there is "Abril Cuecas Mil", an event where the entire community dances the cueca, a traditional Chilean dance.

loans.use: Materials and ingredients

loans.name: Ruth Melania

texts.es:
la sra. Ruth Melania S. se dedica al comercio, tiene una pulpería la cual opera bajo el nombre de “pulpería Marvin” su negocio esta ubicado en la Terminal de transportes frente al estacionamiento de buses de San Matías.
El crecimiento en su negocio es notable, los clientes la prefieren por la atención que les brinda y los precios que les da, ya que su negocio es uno de los que luce de mejor surtido en ese sector y tiene a la venta los productos de mayor consumo diario, muchos viajeros antes de salir a sus lugares de origen aprovechan para comprar lo  más necesario de consumo diario y llevar a sus hogares. 

Doña Ruth vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos de los cuales solo uno depende de ellos, el compañero de doña Ruth se dedica a la reparación de llantas para vehículos.

El hijo que actualmente depende del matrimonio es un niño especial ya que padece de hidrocefalia y la única persona que lo cuida es doña Ruth.

el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi surtir su negocio, las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para los gastos de su hijo.
texts.en:
Ruth Melania S. is a merchant, she has a grocery store which she operates under the name "Pulperia Marvin". Her business is located in the transportation terminal across from the San Matias bus parking lot. 

The growth of her business is remarkable. Her customers prefer her because of the attention that she gives them and because of her prices since her business is one of the ones that is best stocked in the area and she sells products that are highly consumed daily. Before they leave, many passengers buy the necessary products for daily consumption to take to their homes. 

Ruth lives with a live-in partner and has three children of which only one is dependent on them. Her partner repairs car tires. 

Her son who is currently dependent on them is a special child since he suffers from hydrocephaly and the only person who cares for him in Ruth. 

She will use the loan to purchase merchandise to stock her business. She needs the profits to cover her home's expenses and for expenses for her son.

loans.use: Purchase products for her grocery store.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy inventory, and baking ingredients.

loans.name: Miriam Del Socorro

texts.es: Miriam del Socorro la actividad económica a la que se dedica es la venta de artesanía y manualidades, ella inicia este negocio por la necesidad de sufragar este medio de vida. Ella sale todos los días a ofrecer los diferentes productos que sus clientes le solicitan, está orgullosa por el buen desempeño que ha obtenido por medio de su negocio. El crédito será invertido en la compra de   pinturas, cerámicas, adornos entre otros.
texts.en:
Miriam del Socorro sells artwork and crafts. She started this business because she needed to earn a living. Miriam goes out every day to offer different products that her customers request. She is proud of what she has accomplished through her business.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of paintings, ceramics, decorations, and other items.

loans.use: Purchase paintings, ceramics, decorations, and other items

loans.name: Tito

texts.es:
Tito  es una persona muy conocido en el lugar donde vive por lo dedicado a su hijo y a su trabajo, el vive solo con sus hijo  en la  comunidad de Buena Vista provincia Mizque del departamento  de Cochabamba, Tito  con  47 años de edad, sus padres no pudieron ayudarlo por los escasos recursos que viven y   desde muy joven conoció a la madre de su hijo y ella por la situación de los bajo recursos tomo la decisión de salir al exterior y ya son mas de 8 años que no tienen noticias mas de ella, Tito empezó a trabajar en una carpintería y ahí fue aprendiendo y con el esfuerzo de su trabajo.

Con el  crédito que está solicitando el desea comprar madera para trabajar con su propio material y asi  aumentar sus ingresos y   mejorar su  calidad de vida de su hijo y de el.
texts.en:
Tito is an individual who is well-known in his community for being dedicated to his child and to his work. He lives alone with his son in the community of Buena Vista, Mizque Province, Department of Cochabamba. Tito is 47 years old. His parents could not help him because they live in a low-income neighborhood. As a young man, he met the mother of his child. Eight years ago, she decided to leave the country because they were poor and has not been heard from since. Tito began working at a carpentry shop where he learned the trade and how to put in his best effort.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy wood. By working with his own materials, Tito will be able to increase his income and improve the quality of life for himself and his son.

loans.use: Purchase wood

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald Álvarez es un conocido profesor de música de la trinchera de Alajuela. 
Además de eso Ronald tiene su propio negocio, hace mucho tiempo inicio con una pequeña buseta, transportando estudiantes de la comunidad. Hoy ya tiene tres busetas, sin embargo una de ellas necesita una reparación total del motor. Es por eso que necesita un préstamo de ¢500 000 (quinientos mil colones)  para pagar el arreglo, y poder seguir sirviendo a la comunidad.
El espera que manteniendo el negocio gracias al préstamo podrá más adelante comprarse otra Buseta.
El es socio de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Ronald Álvarez is a well-known music teacher in the community of Alajuela. In addition, Ronald has his own business that he started a long time ago using a small minibus for transporting students in the community. Now he has three minibuses, but one of the vehicles needs an engine overhaul. For this reason he needs a loan of 500,000 CRC to pay for the repairs so that he can continue serving the community.

Ronald expects to maintain his business with the loan so that he can later buy another minibus. He is a member of the Communal Enterprise of Successful Women in Trinchera de Pital, one of the 100 member organizations that make up EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: Minibus repairs

loans.name: Cesar Antonio

texts.es:
El cliente tiene 42 años y radica en el trópico de Cochabamba, desde hace 12 años junto a su esposa e hijos.
Vivía en la ciudad de Cochabamba, ya que sus ingresos eran insuficientes para poder sobrevivir y vio una opción de ir al trópico de Cochabamba, aunque los primeros años fue difícil pero con esmero y muchos esfuerzos y con la ayuda de su familia lograron seguir adelante, trabajo en muchas cosas como peón, en empresas como cocinero, ayudante de albañil, hasta que un día decidió hacer masitas (repostería), poco a poco fue ahorrando y se compró su lote urbano logro construir una casa sencilla.

El crédito que está solicitando es para refaccionar su vivienda y ampliar un poco más, hoy por hoy el señor Cesar trabaja como moto taxista y su negocio de masitas, poco a poco  en el futuro quiere ampliar su negocio y así poder sacar adelante a toda  su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is 42 years old and has lived in the tropics of Cochabamba for twelve years with his wife and children. He previously lived in the city of Cochabamba, but his income was not enough to survive so he chose to move to the tropics of Cochabamba. The early years were difficult, but with great care and effort and the help of his family, he was able to move forward. Cesar worked several jobs as a laborer, a chef, and a masonry assistant until one day he decided to make desserts (cakes). He saved up money over time until he bought a lot where he built a modest house.

The loan he is requesting will be used to repair his home and expand it a little more. Today Sr. Cesar works as a motorcycle taxi driver and at his dessert business. Over time, he wants to expand his business in the future so that his entire family can get ahead.

loans.use: Home repairs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Rosandra Maria

texts.es: Rosandra María se dedica a brindar el servicio de taller de costura. Hace más de 22 años que se dedica a este negocio. Inicio porque no tenía un trabajo que le proporcionara los ingresos diarios a su hogar. Este trabajo le ha gustado mucho pues siempre se ha preocupado por proporciónale a su familia lo más necesario. Todos los días desde muy temprano tiene que realizar la entrega de pedidos. Este crédito que solicita es para la compra de telas, cintas, bordados, hilos de todos los colores.
texts.en: Rosandra María runs a tailoring service. She has been running this business for more than 22 years. She started because she didn't have a job that brought in enough daily income to her household. She has liked this job a lot because she has always been worried about providing her family with the necessities. Every day, starting very early, she has to carry out the delivery of the requests. This loan that she asks for is for the purchase of fabric, ribbons, embroidery materials, and threads of all colors.

loans.use: Money for work

loans.name: Orlando Henry

texts.es:
El cliente tiene 24 Años, vive en el trópico de Cochabamba en la localidad de entre ríos, tiene su pareja y tienen una hija de 1 año.
El señor Orlando se vino al trópico, de la provincia cercado del departamento de Cochabamba, por mayor oportunidad de trabajo, porque en la ciudad los sueldos son bajos y los productos de la canasta familiar son cada vez más caros, apenas alcanza para sobrevivir.
Cuando llegó indica, que se vino con unas cuantas ropas a la casa de sus suegros, ahí ayudaba a cargar fruta de temporada y llevaban a la ciudad de santa cruz, para su comercialización, aun Orlando  no podía encontrar un trabajo seguro, se presentaba a las empresas pero no le seleccionaban, cansado de esperar, quiso regresar a la ciudad de Cochabamba, pero de repente de una de las empresas le llamaron y hasta la fecha trabaja en esta empresa.

Con el transcurso del tiempo fue  ahorrando poco a poco y fue comprándose un lote urbano y se hizo una pequeña habitación, ahora  el cliente solicita el crédito para seguir ampliando su vivienda y estar un poco más cómodo,ampliar con una pequeña construccion mas, tiene un sueño poner su propio negocio, y de esa manera sobresalir de esta situación, y posteriormente quiere  comprarse una casa en la ciudad de Cochabamba.
texts.en:
The client is 24 and he lives between rivers in the tropical area of  Cochabamba.  He has a partner and they have a 1-year old daughter.

Orlando came to the tropics from the province around Cochabamba department for better working opportunities.  In the city salaries are low and prices for products that families need continue to get more expensive and he hardly made enough to survive.

When he arrived he tells us that he came with only a few pieces of clothing from his in-law’s house.  There he transported fruit during the season to sell in the city of Santa Cruz .  But even then Orlando couldn’t find steady work.  He looked for work with businesses but he wasn’t chosen.  Tired of waiting he wanted to return to Cochabamba when suddenly one of the companies called him and he has been working there since.
 
With the passing of time little by little he saved some money and bought a lot in the urban area.  He built a small house and now he is requesting a loan to continue enlarging it with just a bit more construction to be more comfortable.  His dream is to have his own business.  This would help him get ahead with his current situation and then he would like to buy a house in Cochabamba.

loans.use: Construction to enlarge his house

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La Señorita Nancy V. O., es una persona de 19 años de edad, soltera, bachiller en humanidades, vive con sus padres, es agricultora produce papa, arveja, maíz y cebada en la comunidad de Plano Bajo - Tíraque que está ubicado a unos 65 Km. aproximadamente desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. También tiene previsto estudiar una carrera superior en la Universidad Mayor de San Simón de Cochabamba ya que le aceptaron como estudiante regular. Sus padres son personas de la tercera edad, a pesar de esto siguen trabajando y colaborando activamente con su hija para poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos, mejorando de esta manera sus condiciones de vida. 

Para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión  para comprar una bomba de agua para facilitar el riego de sus cultivos, asimismo también la señorita Nancy comprara patos ya que dispone de estanques que puedan acoger a estos animales y de esta forma obtener otros ingresos adicionales a partir de la venta de huevo y carne.
texts.en:
Ms. Nancy V. O. is 19 years old. She is single and a high school graduate. She lives with her parents and is a farmer. She grows potatoes, peas, corn and barley in the community of Plano Bajo - Tíraque, located approximately 65 Km. from the city of Cochabamba. She is also planning on studying at the Universidad Mayor de San Simón of Cochabamba, since they accepted her as a regular student. Her parents are elderly, but despite that they continue working and cooperating actively with their daughter to be able to increase their income, thus improving their quality of life. 

To that effect, they are in need of needing to ask for investment capital to buy a water pump to facilitate the irrigation of their crops.  Ms. Nancy will also buy ducks since she has ponds where she can keep these animals and in this way have additional income by selling eggs and meat.

loans.use: To increase investment capital for farming activity.

loans.name: Santa María Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa María lo conforman cinco féminas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ella es la señora Corina M. de 78 años quien desde hace 30 años tiene su propio negocio el cual inicio con la realización de tortilla y luego cuando su hijo le regalo una mantenedora empezó a vender gaseosa, helados, hielos y cuajadas. 
Ella con el crédito comprara maíz, leña, cuajada y frijoles para su negocio.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Elisa Antonia M. Salazar quien vende nacatamales, ropa usada y realiza trabajo de costura, Judith N. comercializa discos, Maira V. López vende ropa y comida y Miurel de 24 años vende productos Avon desde hace tres años.
texts.en:
The Santa María group is made up of five hard working, enterprising women. One of them is Mrs. Corina M., who is 78. For 30 years, she has had her own business which she started by making tortillas. Later, when her son gave her a refrigerator, she began to sell soft drinks, ice cream, ice and curds.   

With her loan, she will buy corn, firewood, curd and beans for her business. The other members of the group are Elisa Antonia M. Salazar, who sells nacatamales, used clothing, and does sewing. Judith N. sells disks, Maira V. López sells clothes and food, and Miurel, who is 24 years old, has sold Avon products for three years.

loans.use: For basic grains

loans.name: Eleodoro

texts.es: Eleodoro tiene 62 años, es un hombre casado. La actividad económica es la venta de frijoles y leña. El  dio inicio este negocio por que no tenía un trabajo, y su esposa necesitaba el sustento diario, a pesar de lo difícil que es su situación mantiene la alegría con sus clientes. Hace más de 5 años que se dedica a este negocio y con mucho esfuerzo es que ha logrado salir adelante con su actividad. El financiamiento que solicita es destinado para capital de trabajo para la compra de frijoles y leña. A pesar de los difíciles problemas que enfrenta como las cuentas por cobrar. Los sueños de Eleodoro son de proporcionarle a su familia las condiciones de vida necesarias.
texts.en:
Eleodoro is 62 years old and married. He sells beans and firewood. He started this line of work because he didn't have a job and his wife needed support. In spite of the difficulties he is faced with, he always maintains a positive outlook with his customers. 

Eleodoro began this business more than five years ago and with a lot of effort he has been able to move forward with this line of work. He will use the loan he has requested as working capital to purchase beans and wood. 

In spite of the difficulties he faces and the bills he has to pay, Eleodoro dreams of being able to provide his family with the necessities in life.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Uriel Ernesto

texts.es:
En el departamento de Masaya, Municipio de Masaya el señor Uriel Ernesto O. M., diariamente realiza su labor como Inspector de Campo desde hace 3 años en ENACAL-Masaya.

Este señor actualmente es soltero, su núcleo familiar es: su mamá y dos hermanas, estas todavía se encuentran estudiando, él les ayuda con sus estudios ya que quiere que sus hermanas se preparen y tengan un futuro prospero y le ayuda económicamente a su mamá, actualmente el siente la necesidad de reparar la casa de habitación en la que convive con su familia, prácticamente lo que quiere es cambiar techo y repellar las paredes.

Considera que haciendo este esfuerzo para mejorar la casa está contribuyendo a que todos vivas bien, y la época de invierno que viene no les afecte.
texts.en:
In the Masaya region, Mr. Uriel Ernesto O. Marínez has been working as a field inspector for three years in ENACAL-Masaya.

This man is single. His nuclear family includes his mom and two sisters, who are still studying. He helps them with their studies because he wants his sisters to be prepared and have a prosperous future. He helps his mom out economically. Currently, he feels the need to repair the home that his family lives in. He wants to change the roof and plaster the walls.

He thinks that making this effort to improve the house will help everyone to live well, and the winter season that is coming up will not affect them.

loans.use: Home repairs

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
El Senor Jose Francisco E., es habitante de Jumali, del Municipio de Pueblo Nuevo, en Esteli, casado, de 50 anos de edad, con 4 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura.
Desde muy corta Edad Don Jose tuvo que dedicarse por tiempo completo a ayudar a sus padres en las actividades de la siembra, por lo que le impidio completamente a estudiar, a penas logro terminar el primer grado de primaria.
Cuando se independizo, realizo una sociedad con un agricultor de su comunidad, durante 8 anos y actualmente es independiente.
El se dedica principalmente a la siembra de hortalizas, pero tambien en temporadas, siembra granos basicos, acomodandose con el terreno que cuenta.
Realizo este prestamo para la siembra de 1/2 manzana de Tomate, sobre todo lo quiere para la compra de Insumos varios. Don Jose esta muy optimista de obtener buenos resultados de esta cosecha y muy contento de poder ayudar a ootras personas con fuete de empleo.
Su meta es seguir mejorando su nivel de vida poco a poco, pero sobre todo recoger dinero para poder operar a su hijo (14 anos de edad), que tiene problemas en el corazon.
texts.en:
Señor Jose Francisco E. lives in Jumali, in the municipality of Pueblo Nuevo in Esteli. He is married, 50 years old, has four children and works in agriculture. For a long time, Don Jose has had to devote all his time to helping his parents with planting and because of this, he was unable to focus on school and barely managed to finish first grade. 

When he moved away from home, he started an agricultural community and is now  independent. He primarily sells vegetable seeds but also sells basic grains when they are in season, depending on the location. This loan will be used for the seeds of .9 acres of tomatoes. Above all what he wants is to buy various raw materials. Don Jose is very optimistic about achieving good results with this harvest and is very happy to be able to help other people with a source of employment. 

His goal is to continue improving his quality of life little by little, but above all to be able to earn enough money to be able to pay for his 14-year-old son's heart operation.

loans.use: To plant tomatoes.

loans.name: Desiderio Rolando

texts.es:
El señor Desiderio Rolando G. F. tiene 37 años de edad y vive en la casa de sus padres  en la comunidad de San Andres de esta ciudad de Tarija. Desiderio no es casado pero tiene un hijo. Desiderio se dedica desde hace mas de 20 años a la producción agrícola sacando al mercado productos como ser: papa, zanahoria, arveja, etc. Productos que saca a vender en el mercado campesino de esta ciudad. Desiderio quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante , pero el nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de comprar semillas de papa, abonos, remedios, etc. Es por eso que el crédito será destinado para la compra de dichos productos, para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.   
                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Desiderio nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite sera para mejorar las condiciones de su casa donde vive.
texts.en: Desiderio Rolando G. F. is 37 years old and lives in his parents' house in the community of San Andres in the city of Tarija. Desiderio isn't married but he has a son. He has made a living for the past 20 years in agriculture, taking products such as potatoes, carrots, peas, etc., to sell at the city's country market. Desiderio wants to increase his income so he can keep making headway, but he tells us that he needs to purchase potato seeds, fertilizers and other items. He plans to use the loan he is requesting to purchase these products and in this way he can increase his income. Desiderio tells us that he wants to improve his living conditions, so the next loan that he requests will be to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: Purchase agricultural supplies

loans.name: El Manantial De Vida Group

texts.es:
el grupo el manantial de vida esta ubicado en la colonia Ismael Acosta de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, esta integrado por tres mujeres, a continuacion se detallan las diferentes actividades que ellas realizan:

la señora Maria Felix C. tiene 54 años de edad, tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella, su esposo el señor Santos Euceda se dedica a trabajar como bombero de agua en la alcaldia del municipio de San Lorenzo.
doña maria felix tiene un molino para moler maiz, le muele a casi toda la colonia, todos los dias Maria se levanta a las 4:00 am a moler el maiz a sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para darle un mantenimiento al molino.
 
doña Maria Elena R. tiene 65 años de edad, es madre soltera y no tiene hijos que dependan de ella, Maria se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de nacatamales, taquitos de papa y arroz.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz, verduras, carne de cerdo y pollo, aceite, papas, arroz, hojas de platano y la leña para elaborar su producto.
 
doña Maria Yolanda P. tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos que dependen de ella, Maria se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tortillas, sus clientes son sus vecinos y otras personas que vienen a comprarle a su casa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz y leña al por mayor porque el maiz esta subiendo de precio.
 
las tres integrantes de este grupo son mujeres  muy humildes y trabajadoras.
texts.en:
The group "El Manantial de Vida" is located in the neighborhood of Ismael Acosta in the city of San Lorenzo.  It is made up of 3 women, whose activities are as follows: 

Mrs. Maria Feliz C. is 54 years old, with 2 children who depend on her.  Her husband, Mr. Santos Euceda, is a fireman in the mayor's office in the municipality of San Lorenzo.  

Maria Felix has a mill to grind corn.  She grinds it for almost the entire neighborhood.  Every day, Maria gets up at 4am to grind corn for her customers.  She will use the credit to buy replacement parts for maintenance on her grinder

Mrs. Maria Elena R. is 65 years old, and a single mother of grown children.  Maria makes and sells nacatamales, and rice and potato tacos.  She will use the loan to buy corn, vegetables, pork, chicken, oil, potatoes, rice, plantain leaves and firewood to make her products.

Mrs. Maria Yolanda P. is 40 years old, and has 5 young children.  Maria makes and sells tortillas to her neighbors and other people that come to her home to buy them.   She will use the loan to buy corn and firewood in bulk, because corn prices are going up. 

The three members of this group are very hardworking and humble women.

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood, vegetables, pork, chicken, potatoes, plantain leaves, rice, shortening, and spare parts for the mill

loans.name: Carmen Rosario

texts.es: La señora Carmen vive en la casa de su suegra con su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes siguen en el colegio su esposo trabajo como oficial y ella vende zapatos, cosméticos por catalogo también cocina cuando tiene algunos contratos por que no le alcanza con el sueldo de su esposo ya que son cuatro en su familia y el estilo de vida de ahora no le da para todos los gastos,  por ese motivo tiene que buscar la manera de ganar unos cuantos centavos mas para poder sobresalir pero lo va muy bien en  el negocio de la venta de zapatos y cosméticos ya que no le quita mucho tiempo y puede estar con sus hijos mas tiempo es por eso que saco el préstamo para la compra de mercadería de cosméticos que se encuentran en promoción y así de esta forma incrementar su capital de trabajo, es una persona muy trabajadora siempre viendo a que actividad dedicarse, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señora Carmen lives in her mother-in-law's house with her husband and two children, who go to school.  Her husband is a skilled worker, and she sells shoes and cosmetics by catalog.  She also cooks when she has contracts to do so because her husband's wages do not cover all of their family's expenses since there are four of them and because of their lifestyle.  This is why she has to look for a way to make a bit more money to be able to get ahead.  Her business selling shoes and cosmetics doesn't take very much time away from her, and she can spend more time with her children.  This is why she is taking out a loan to buy cosmetics that are on sale.  She will increase her working capital in this way.  She is a very hard-working woman, always looking for an actiivity to which to dedicate herself.  She is very grateful to this institution for the support it has offered her.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and shoes

loans.name: Julio César

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Granada, Departamento de Granada, muy arduamente el señor Julio César M. B. se dedica a la labor de Fontanero desde hace tres años en la empresa ENACAL-Granada, quien es soltero, con un único dependiente quien es su mamá.

Los anhelos que este señor tiene es el de tener una casa cómoda en donde se sienta bien su mamá y con toda la seguridad posible, es por esta razón que ahora él se decidió a visitar las oficinas de CEPRODEL para solicitar un crédito y realizar un mejoramiento de vivienda que consiste en hacer cambio de techo  y de esta forma poder contribuir al bienestar y satisfacción de su mamá.
texts.en:
In the city of Grandada, in the department of Granada, señor Julio César M. B. has worked very hard as a plumber for three years.  He works at the company, ENACAL-Granada.  He is single, and his only dependent is his mother.

His dream is to have a comfortable home where his mother feels at ease and as safe as possible.  This is why he decided to visit CEPRODEL's offices to request a loan and to make improvements to his home that include replacing the roof.  In this way, he will contribute to the well-being and satisfaction of his mother.

loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La señora Ana Virginia P. Martínez de 29 años es propietaria de una fritanga, restaurante popular que consiste en comida frita. Ella inicio con la venta de tajas con queso, tacos y enchiladas luego gracias a los préstamos invirtió en carne y pollo. 
Ella tiene la meta de invertir en otro negocio en futuro próximo con el fin de proporcionarle una  mejor calidad de vida a su hijo de 6 años.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ana Virginia P. Martínez is 29 years old and is an owner of a "fritanga" which is a fried food restaurant. She started out selling cheese slices, tacos, enchiladas, and was later able to buy meat and chicken thanks to a previous loan.
She has in mind growing another business in the future to be able to offer her children a higher standard of living.

loans.use: To buy meat and chicken.

loans.name: Pastora

texts.es:
La señora Pastora R. G. tiene 31 años de edad y vive en una casa en alquiler vivienda que esta ubicada en la ciudad de Tarija. Pastora es madre soltera de 2 hijos, por circunstancias de la vida se quedo sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos. Pastora se dedica desde hace mas de 7 años a trabajar en una empresa muy reconocida en esta ciudad la cual se dedica a la venta de comida rápida que es pollo a  la broster  la empresa se llama Crocan pollo, por otro lado, Pastora tiene una tienda de barrio en la cual vende abarrotes. Pastora quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante junto con sus hijos, pero ella nos cuenta que quiere comprar un cierto monto de mercadería porque le dijeron que los mismos subirán de precio, como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro, el crédito será destinado para la compra de dicha mercadería, para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Pastora  nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo credito que solicite sera para la compra de mas mercadería porque le esta yendo muy bien en ese negocio.
texts.en: Mrs Pastora R. G. is 31 years old and rents an apartment located in the town of Tarija. Pastora is a single mother of 2. Since she is alone she now must work to help her children succeed. Pastora has been working in a well known company in the city for more than 7 years where she sells fast food such as chicken brost at a place called Crocan Chicken. On the side, Pastora has a small grocery store. Pastora wants to make more profits to improve her life along with her children. She tells us she wants to buy a certain amount of merchandise because their prices will rise soon. Since she has experience in the business, the loan will be used to buy such merchandise to increase profits. Patora tells us she wants to improve her standard of living which is why the loan will be used to buy more merchandise especially since her business is doing very well.

loans.use: To buy materials to make fast food.

loans.name: Oscar Danilo

texts.es:
En el Municipio de Granada, del Departamento de Granada, habita el señor Oscar Danilo E. M. quien al mismo tiempo labora en la misma ciudad desde hace dos años y ocho meses como conductor en la empresa ENACAL.

Este señor es casado y tiene un núcleo familiar de 3 personas entre ellos dos menores de edad, a quienes con mucho orgullo les provee de todo lo que necesitan, sus sueños que tiene este señor es el de realizar construcción de vivienda (mejoramiento) para crear las condiciones necesarias y que su familia viva bien, por eso se decidió a visitar las oficinas de CEPRODEL para solicitar un crédito y de está forma realizar lo que tiene pensado en su casa la cual es agrandarla y crear las condiciones propicias para que su familia se sientan bien.
texts.en:
In the town of Granada, Granada department, lives Mr. Oscar Danilo Ezpinoza M. who has been working in the same city for two years and eight months as a manager in the company of ENACAL.
This man is married and has a family of 3 including minors who he proudly maintains. His dreams are to make improvements within the house for his family to live well. That is why he decided to visit the CEPRODEL offices and requested a loan. With this loan he plans to enlarge and make suitable living conditions for his family's comfort.

loans.use: Construction of his home.

loans.name: Rosaura Dionicia

texts.es:
La señora Rosura Dionicia C. S. tiene 45 años de edad y vive en una casa en anticretico vivienda que esta ubicada en zona de la terminal de la ciudad de Tarija. Rosaura es madre soltera de un hijo, por circunstancias de la vida se quedo sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a su hijo. Rosaura se dedica desde hace mas de 12 años a trabajar en una empresa muy reconocida en esta ciudad la cual se dedica a la venta de comida rapida que es pollo a  la broster  la empresa se llama Crocan pollo,  Rosaura quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante junto con su hijo , pero ella nos cuenta que quiere comprarse un horno industrial para poder vender pollo a la broaster, como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro el crédito será destinado para la compra de dicho horno que es necesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        

Rosaura  nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para la compra de mas maquinas industriales.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosaura Dionicia C. S. is 45 years old and lives in a rental house located in the section of the city of Tarija where the bus terminal is located. Rosaura is a single mother with one child. Due to life’s circumstances, she ended up alone and now has to work so that her son can get ahead. For more than 12 years, Rosaura has worked at a well-known business in the city – a fast food restaurant that sells roasted chicken called “Crocan Pollo”.

Rosaura wants to earn more income so that she and her son can get ahead, but she says that she wants to buy an industrial oven so that she can sell roasted chickens. She has the experience in this business and will buy the needed oven that will allow her to increase her income.

Rosaura says that she wants to improve her living conditions and will use her next loan to buy more industrial machines.

loans.use: Purchase an industrial oven for roasting chickens

loans.name: Juan Humberto

texts.es:
el sr. Juan Humberto M. se dedica al comercio, cuenta con un negocio de venta de verduras y frutas, gracias a su negocio obtiene ganancias que le permiten cubrir los gastos del hogar.
Su negocio esta ubicado en un lugar de bastante transito de personas, las verduras las compra a los diversos pobladores que cultivan dichas verduras y tiene que contar con suficiente efectivo para poder comprar lo suficiente, ya que ellos solo van una vez a la semana.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de verduras y frutas para tener mucho inventario y no quedarse corto a media semana.
texts.en:
Juan Humberto M. is a merchant, he has a business selling vegetables and fruits. Thanks to his business he obtains profits that allow him to cover his home's expenses. 

His business is located in a place with considerable foot traffic. He buys the vegetables from different people that grow the vegetables. He has to have enough cash to buy enough vegetables since the vendors only go once a week. 

He will use this loan to buy vegetables and fruit so that he can have a lot of inventory and so that he will not run out mid-week.

loans.use: Purchase potatoes, onions, bananas, apples, tomatoes, chiles, garlic, melons, cabbage, lettuce and cucumbers.

loans.name: Miriam Juliana

texts.es: Miriam tiene 37 años de edad, casada, originaria del Municipio de San Cristóbal, departamento de Totonicapan,  Madre de 5 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de aves  y esta solicitando su primer crédito en Asociacion ASDIR , ya que tiene 2 años de tener  experiencia  en crianza de aves y desea esta ayuda para incrementar su negocio.
texts.en: Miriam is 37 years old, married, and a native of the town of San Cristóbal in the Department of Totonicapan.  She is the mother of five children.  Miriam sells poultry and is requesting her first loan from Asociación ASDIR.  She has two years of experience raising poultry and wants assistance with growing her business.

loans.use: Operating capital for her poultry business

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es: La Sra. Adriana vive en la localidad de Villa Tumavi, del municipio de el torno distante a 15 km de la comunidad, es nacida en el departamento de Cochabamba, hace unos 18 años que se vino a vivir al departamento de Santa Cruz, con su esposo el cual ya falleció, la Sra. Adriana es viuda, el destino  del crédito es para terminar de construir su domicilio, necesita comprar materiales de construcción, hace unos 30 años que se dedica ala agricultura hoy en día ella con la ayuda de su hija, siembran papa, Maíz, Yuca, cítricos, y una ves que cosechan comercializan sus productos en el mercado de el Torno; se siente agradecida con Emprender y Kiva por el apoyo económico que le ha brindado.
texts.en: Adriana lives in a place called Villa Tumavi, about 15 kilometers outside of the center of Torno, in Santa Cruz.  She was born in Cochabamba, but 18 years ago she came to live in Santa Cruz with her husband.  Adriana's husband died and she is now a widow.   The loan she is requesting is to purchase materials to complete construction on her home.   30 years ago Adriana worked in agriculture, and now, with the help of her daughter, she grows potatoes, corn, yuca and citrus fruits, which she sells in the market of Torno.   Adriana is grateful to the organization Emprender and Kiva for the economic support they have provided to her.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials to complete needed work on her home

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La señora Ana del Carmen L. es una señora de 41 años honrada responsable y emprendedora, actualmente soltera con la compañía de 2 hijos de 21 y 15 años de edad los cuales le apoyan en su negocio que posee desde hace 4 años en el cual vende ropa, zapatos y nacatamales.
Su deseo de superarse la llevo a optar por obtener un crédito para invertir en su negocio y así tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer y crecer en el mercado.
texts.en:
Sra. Ana del Carmen L. is a 41 year old woman who is honest, responsible, and enterprising. She is currently single and lives with her two children (ages 21 and 15) who she supports. For the past four years, she has managed a business selling clothes, shoes, and Nicaraguan tamales.

Due to her desire to succeed, she has decided to access a loan to invest in her business. This will allow her to have a wider variety of products to offer so that she can grow in the marketplace.

loans.use: Acquire clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvements.

loans.name: Cruz Absalon

texts.es:
El senor Cruz Absalon, vive actualmente en la Comarca Namanji, es casado, con 1 hijo, tiene 30 anos de edad, se con mas de 16 anos de dedicarse a la agricultura.
Es originario de la Comunidad Los Arguetas en el Departamento de Jinotega a unos 42 kms del norte de Esteli; el recuerda que desde los 6 anos de edad le ayudaba a su Papa con las actividades agricolas en la casa.
Inicio ayudandole a arrear las vacas, a cuidar los sembradillos de las aves. A los 12 anos de edad tuvo su primer siembra en sociedad con un amigo, y el recuerda que de esa ganancia se compro su primer par de zapatos; posteriormente a los 18 anos comenzo a sembrar Repollo, tambien en sociedad.
Desde que se caso a los 22 anos de edad, su suegra le ha apoyado y a sembrado Repollo y Cebolla; pero fuera de temporada se dedica a la compra/venta de Ganado.
Realizo este Credito para compra de insumos, para la siembra de Cebolla, espera obtener mejores rendimientos en sus cultivos y de mejor calidad; ya que ahora las exigencias de mercado son mayores.
Su meta es comprar su propio terreno, mejorar su vivienda, ser independiente.
texts.en:
Sr. Cruz Absalon currently lives in the Namanji region. He is 30 years old, married, and has one child. Cruz has been farming for more than 16 years.

He is originally from the community of Los Arguetas in the Department of Jinotega, which is approximately 42 kilometers north of Esteli. At the age of six, he remembers helping his father with the farming duties around their home. He started by helping herd the cows and caring for the baby chicks. When he was 12 years old, Cruz planted his first crop with the help of a friend. Later when he was 18 years old, he started planting cabbage, also with the help of a friend.

When he got married at the age of 22, his mother-in-law helped him with the planting of cabbage and onions. During the off-season, he engages in the purchase and sale of cattle. Cruz applied for this loan in order to buy supplies for planting onions. He hopes to obtain larger crop yields that are of better quality since there is greater demand at the market. His goals include buying his own land, making improvements to his home, and becoming independent.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for planting onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make necessary repairs on his home

loans.name: Macario

texts.es:
El Señor Macario V. C., es una persona de 45 años de edad de estado civil concubino, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su casa propia, tiene 4 dependientes económicos, la actividad principal a la que se dedica es la agricultura, produce papa, cebada, haba y arveja, asimismo como actividad secundaria brinda los servicios de albañil en la comunidad de Rodeo Alto – Tíraque que esta distante aproximadamente a unos 70 Km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba.
 En la actividad de la agricultura intervienen toda la familia la esposa y los hijos para poder incrementar su producción ya que en la actualidad disponen de mayor superficie cultivable ya que los hermanos de don Macario le cedieron su terrenos en préstamo porque ellos viven en el interior del país, por tanto necesitan comprar mayor cantidad de semilla y otros insumos principales para la producción y de esta forma incrementar su producción de los distintos productos que cultivan de tal forma poder obtener mayores ingresos económicos mejorando de esta manera sus condiciones de vida. 
Para tal efecto don Macario y su familia se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para poder comprar materia prima para la producción como ser semillas agrícolas y abono de gallinaza.
texts.en: Macario V. C. is 45 years old and married.   He completed his primary schooling and lives in his own house with his 4 children whom he supports.   Macario works in agriculture, growing potatoes and other crops, and he also works as a bricklayer in the city of Rodeo Alto, which is located about 70 kilometers from Cochabamba.   Macario's entire family helps in the agriculture business, including his wife and children, as well as his brothers who loan him land to grow his crops.   Macario needs to buy more seeds, as well as materials needed to increase production and increase his income, which improves the quality of life for his family.   He is requesting a loan so that he can purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: To invest in his agriculture business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials for home improvements

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francesco Agustín G. inicio hace 10 años con la producción y comercio de cepillos para lavar ropa actividad que aprendió de un vecino con el cual trabajo hasta que se independizó. En un inicio a él le costó mucho realizar este trabajo pero gracias a las instrucciones de su jefe y su empeño logro progresar.
Él tiene tres hijos de 17, 9 y 4 años por los cuales solicito el crédito escolar el cual es una ayuda para poder comprar los útiles de sus hijos, los uniformes…etc.
texts.en:
Ten years ago, Sr. Francisco Agustín G. started a business making and selling brushes used for washing clothes. He learned this trade from a neighbor before becoming independent. At first he had a lot of difficulty performing this type of work, but thanks to the instructions provided by his boss and his own commitment, he was able to make progress.

Francisco has three children (ages 17, 9, and 4). The loan he is requesting will be used to help buy school supplies for his children, uniforms, and other items.

loans.use: Purchase school supplies, uniforms, and other items for his children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for dental work and a prosthetic for his daughter

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es: Bernardo, de 64 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposa Nilda de52 años y de sus dos jóvenes hijos que ya trabajan independientes; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Desde hace 6 años este emprendedor hombre se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte en un motocarro. Se siente muy satisfecho pues la labor que desempeña durante todo el día, de lunes a viernes, le genera regulares ganancias, que le han permitido sacar adelante a su familia; además con el tiempo ha logrado comprarse un motocarro más que brinda en alquiler y así obtiene mejores rentas. Manifiesta que le agrada mucho trabajar prestando servicio de movilidad pues se entretiene bastante con los paisajes de la zona; además es un trabajo tranquilo pues no tiene mucha presión. Como es un hombre emprendedor para el futuro tiene planeado instalar una flota de motocarros  para administrarla, de esta manera espera alcanzar el progreso. Es el cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá salir adelante. Bernardo tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en mandar a refaccionar su herramienta de trabajo, pues ha presentado algunas imperfecciones y quiere brindar un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Bernardo, 64, lives in his own house alongside his wife, Nilda, 52, and their two young children who already work independently.  Together they strive daily to get ahead.

For the last six years this enterprising man has been providing public transportation services in his vehicle.  He feels very satisfied because the work he does all day, from Monday through Friday, generates regular income which has made it possible for him to support his family.  Besides, in time he has managed to buy an additional vehicle that he leases out thus earning better profits.

He states that he enjoys providing transportation services because he enjoys the scenery in the area quite a bit; besides, it’s a tranquil job with little stress.  Because he’s an enterprising man he plans in the future to set up a fleet of vehicles to run thus attaining progress.

This is his 4th loan with MFP and he promises to be punctual with his payments because he does not want to disappoint the people who make the loan possible which will allow him to get ahead.

Bernardo plans to use the requested loan to service his vehicle because it has started to manifest a few problems and he wants to provide better service.

loans.use: For vehicle technical maintenance.

loans.name: Francia

texts.es:
Francia de 51 años, es una mujer trabajadora que ha trabajado para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de sus cinco hijos.  Como una microempresaria inicio con su negocio en un puesto de venta de comida rápida como venta de alitas asadas, plátanos y maíz asado. 

En la actualidad trabaja desde las 15h00pm vendiendo su comida a sus clientes hasta las 19h00pm. Tiene muchas aspiraciones para su negocio por eso quiere continuar con él y seguir en el ambiente de la comida a persona del sector. Quiere comprar con el préstamo carnes para dar más especialidades a sus clientes.  En el futuro quiere asegurar la vida económica de sus hijos con un capital beneficioso.
texts.en:
Francia is 51 years old and works hard to help her husband with the expenses of their five children. As a microentrepreneur, she started a business at a fast food stand where she sells grilled chicken wings, plantains, and roasted corn.

She currently works from 3pm selling food to her customers until 7pm. Francia has many aspirations for her business, so she wants to continue forward as an expert in the food trade. She wants to use this loan to buy meat in order to prepare her specialties for her customers. In the future, she wants to secure her children’s financial future with useful capital.

loans.use: Purchase meat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials to build his house

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.es: La Sra. Felicidad es una cliente antigua de la institución que ya fue  beneficiaria del  el crédito kiva, la clienta   ha mostrando responsabilidad   en los pagos de sus créditos, y por esta razón se  decidió otorgarle un nuevo  crédito.  Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de muebles lo refacciona y los vende a un precio mas alto, el puesto de venta  se  encuentra en la populosa  zona de la Ballivian (ubicada al norte de la ciudad de el alto), la señora se esfuerza por superarse ya que trabaja desde la madrugada hasta que se pone el sol, el esposo de la Sra. felicidad se dedica a la construcción de viviendas, quien de igual forma trabaja todo los días, con el dinero del crédito comprara muebles para luego venderlos a un buen precio, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Felicidad is a longtime client of Emprender and has been the beneficiary of a Kiva loan. She has demonstrated responsibility with her loan payments and for this reason is requesting a new loan. Felicidad engages in the purchase and sale of furniture that she repairs and sells at a higher price. Her vending post is located in the crowded area of Ballivian (which is located to the north of the city of El Alto). Sra. Felicidad strives to succeed by working from dawn until sunset. Her husband engages in home construction and works in the same manner every day.

The money from this loan will be used to buy furniture that she will sell later at a good price. She is grateful to Emprender for the support that has been provided.

loans.use: Purchase furniture (wardrobes, dining sets, used cabinets)

loans.name: Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora Yamileth C. es una señora de 40 años de edad honrada responsable y emprendedora, actualmente casada con la compañía de 3 hijos de 3, 13 y 17 años. Ella es modista y posee su negocio propio que es un taller de costura.
Su deseo como microempresaria es obtener un crédito que le permita la oportunidad de ampliar su taller para ofrecer mejor el servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Yamileth C. is a 40 year old woman who is honest, responsible, and enterprising. She is currently married and has three children (ages 3, 13, and 17). Yamileth is a dressmaker and has her own business, a sewing workshop.

Her wish as a small business owner is to obtain a loan that will provide her with the opportunity to expand her workshop so that she can provide better service to her customers.

loans.use: Expansion of her workshop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario, de 34 años, vive en su casa que es propia en compañía de su esposo José de 36 años, que es chofer, juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante. Desde hace un año esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a realizar la cobranza  en el transporte de su esposo, pero solo lo realiza tres veces por semana, sobretodo los fines de semana que tienen más demanda. Le gusta su labor pues le permite estar algún tiempo con su pareja además las ganancias del día son integras para ambos, de esta manera con sus ahorros de su trabajo han logrado terminar de construir su vivienda. Pero dice que no le gusta el oficio de chofer de su esposo, pues es algo arriesgado por los constantes accidentes automovilísticos que ocurren en las carreteras, aún así lo continúa apoyando en su labor. Además ya tiene pensado para el futuro instalar un restaurante en un local alquilado, pero que tenga una buena ubicación. Es el sexto crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando. Rosario tiene planeado invertir el crédito en la compra de ingredientes, para cocinar, pues empezará con el negocio de venta de menú en su casa, y espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosario, age 34, lives in his own home with her husband José who is 36 years old and works as a chauffeur. Together they strive each day to get ahead. A year ago this enterprising woman starting collecting fares for her husband's transportation business in which he works alone three times each week, especially on the weekends when there is more demand. She enjoys the work because it gives her some time to spend with her husband on the days when they work together. With the money they have saved from the business, they were able to finish building their house. However, the part of her husband’s job that she does not like is the frequent occurrence of accidents on the roads, yet she continues to support him in his work. Later on, Rosario has future plans to open a restaurant in a rented space situated in a good location.

This is her sixth loan with MFP. She promises to submit her payments on time because she does not want to look bad to the people who made this loan possible so that she could continue working. Rosario plans to invest the loan in the purchase of ingredients for cooking so that she can begin her business of selling food from her home and improve her income.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for her food business

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Doña Angela R. es una señora soltera, tiene 38 años, madre de cuatro hijos. Vive en una casa de alto muy humilde con su compañero y sus cuatro hijos, además de una nieta.  Siempre se ha dedicado al negocio en su misma casa de criar pollos y cerdos para su venta sin descuidar a su familia.
Llegó a la Fundación recomendada por otra clienta, éste es el segundo préstamo que solicita para la misma actividad. 
Ella ve que el negocio de la venta de pollos y cerdos es rentable, ya que siempre tienen salida.
Su familia le ayuda en los oficios domésticos y también en el cuido de los animales.
Su sueño es crecer como persona y como microempresaria para ayudar a sus hijos a terminar sus estudios. 
Actualmente el único obstáculo que presenta es la falta de capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Doña Angela R. is a single woman who is 38 years old and the mother of four children. She lives in a modest home with her companion, their four children, and a granddaughter. Angela has always managed a business out of her home raising chickens and pigs to sell without neglecting her family.

Another client recommended that she join Fundación Mujer. This is the second loan that she has requested for her business.

Angela got into the business of selling chickens and pigs because it is profitable and always easy to get out of it. Her family helps with the household chores as well as taking care of the animals. Angela’s dream is to grow as a person and a small business owner so that she can help her children finish their studies. At the moment, the only obstacle she faces is the lack of operating capital.

loans.use: Purchase chickens & pigs for fattening

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials for his house

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es:
La señora Jenny del Carmen M. es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de comida, gaseosa y refrescos naturales desde hace ocho años con el cual ha sacado adelante a sus tres hijos de 17, 9 y 2 años.
Ella invertirá el crédito principalmente en carne, pollo y granos básicos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Jenny del Carmen M. is a hard-working entrepreneur who has been selling food, softdrinks and natural beverages for eight years in order to provide an income for her three children, ages 17, 9 and 2.

She plans to use the loan mainly to buy meat, chicken and basic grains.

loans.use: To buy meat, chicken and basic grains

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La señora Francisca del Socorro M. de 56 años es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien hace dos años inicio una comideria la cual poco a poco ha ido mejorando. Su meta es remodelar su negocio para que este más adecuado.
Ella tiene dos hijos de 15 años por los cuales trabaja arduamente para sacarlos adelante.
texts.en:
Mrs. Francisca del Socorro M., 56 years old, is a hard-working entrepreneur who has been operating a food stall for two years and which she has been able to improve little by little.  Her goal is to upgrade her business to a more adequate standard.

She has two children who are 15 years old and she works very hard to provide an income for them.

loans.use: To buy meat, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Bessy Tatiana

texts.es:
La Senora Bessy G., es originaria de la Ciudad de Esteli, donde actualmente reside; tiene 24 anos de edad, casada desde hace 6 anos, y tiene 3 hijos (sus hijos tienen 6, 5 y 4 anos de edad).
A pesar de que las condiciones economicas en su familia no eran tan favorables, ella con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio, logro llegar hasta el 4to ano de secundaria.
Dona Bessy, se dedica al comercio, ella vende mercaderia en general ambulante desde hace 2 anos; desde hace unos 4 meses, esta trabajando en una Fabrica de Tabacos "PLACENCIA", en donde aprovecha al maximo, pues ofrece sus productos a todos sus companeros de trabajo, y segun ella le ha ido muy bien.
Acutalmente con el capital de trabajo no es suficiente para cubrir la demanda de sus productos, es por esta razon que ella esta solicitando este credito.
Ella espera aumentar sus oportunidades de tener mayores y mejores ganancias.
Tiene muchos suenos y metas, pero las mas deseadas, son poder establecer un negocio en su propia casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bessy G. is from the city of Esteli where she currently lives.  She is 24 years old, married for six years and has three children, ages 6, 5 and 4.

Despite the fact that she comes from a very humble family, with a lot of effort and sacrifice she was able to finish her 4th year of secondary education.

Doña Bessy has been conducting door-to-door sales of general merchandise for two years.  For four months she has been working at the "PLACENCIA" tobacco factory where she takes full advantage of her situation to sell items to co-workers.  And she has been successful at it.

At this time she does not have sufficient working capital to cover the demand for her products and therefore is requesting this loan.  She hopes to increase her opportunity to earn more and more.

She has many dreams and goals, but the most significant one is to set up her own business out of her home.

loans.use: General retail sales

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es: María tiene 52 años de edad, es casada, comerciante, Madre de 7 hijos y 1 hija, con el apoyo de su esposo Ciriaco a logrado tener un pequeño negocio confección y venta de ropa, ella está solicitando su quinto préstamo en asociación ASDIR para ampliar su capital de trabajo, es una persona responsable, sus créditos  anteriores los ha cancelado sin problema de atraso, en la actividad tiene  15 años de experiencia y necesita de esta ayuda para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old, married and has seven sons and one daughter.  With the help of her husband Ciriaco she has been able to set up a small sewing business and sells clothing.

She is requesting her fifth loan through the ASDIR association in order to increase working capital.  She is a very responsible person and has always paid back her earlier loans on time.  

She has 15 years' experience and needs this help to continue her business.

loans.use: To buy sewing goods and materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials to make improvements for maintenance on his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital for a local store

loans.name: Dominga Pascuala

texts.es: Dominga  tiene 32 años de edad, es casada, comerciante, Originaria del departamento de Totonicapán, madre de dos hijos y una hija, con el apoyo de su esposo Abel, a logrado tener un pequeño negocio,  de venta de sandalia, está solicitando su primer crédito, cuenta con 2 años de experiencia en este negocio y necesita de esta ayuda para que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en: Dominga is 32 years old, married, and is a merchant.  She is a native of the department of Totonicapán and is the mother of two boys and a girl.  With the support of her husband Abel, she has been able to have a small business selling sandals.  She is requesting her first loan.  She has two years of experience with this business and needs this loan so that it continues growing.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To improve his home

loans.name: Leyla Evangelina

texts.es: Leyla Evangelina tiene 59 años, su actividad  es el destace de cerdo y la elaboración de nacatamales. Hace más de 26 años que se dedica a este medio de vida, por lo que siempre está al tanto de lo que sus clientes le solicitan,    ella inicia este negocio por la necesidad de trabajar. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de materia prima ya que siempre tiene una gran variedad de ofertas a su favor.
texts.en: Leyla Evangelina is 59 years old and works butchering pigs and making nacatamales.  She has used this as a way of making a living for more than 26 years and this is why she is always up-to-date on what her customers order.  She began this business out of the need to work.  The loan she is requesting is for the purchase of raw material, as she always has a great variety of offers in her favor.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Consumption, for personal business

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: La señora Maria Isabel  tiene 32 años tiene  2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos. La señora ya tiene 5 años de haber empezado con su negocio,  inicio el negocio en su vivienda, fue así que la mayoría de sus clientes la conocen. El crédito será invertido en la compra de cerdos sus ganancias se incrementan ya que es ahora cuando los precios están bajos. Además ella desea vende al por mayor sus mercancías, pues así la mayoría de sus clientes saben el buen servicio que ofrece. El sueño siempre ha sido realizar mejoras a su casa.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is 32 years old, and she has two minor children under her care.  She buys and sells pigs.  She started this business five years ago at her house.  That is why most of her customers know her.

The loan is to buy pigs.  Her income will increase because the prices are low now.  Also, she wishes to sell her merchandise wholesale.  Most of her customers know the good service that she provides.  

Her dream has always been to make improvements on her house.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Priscila Nohemi

texts.es: Priscila tiene 39 años de edad es casada, tiene  2 hijas y tres hijos, ella esta solicitando su primer crédito en Asociación ASDIR  ya que se dedica a la venta de telas ella se caracteriza por ser una madre luchadora  ya que lleva 10 años de tener este negocio y desea esta ayuda para poder brindarle a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Priscila is 39 years old and married.  She has two daughters and three sons.

She is requesting her first loan with the Asociación ASDIR.  She sells fabric.  She is known for being a tenacious mother.  She has had this business for ten years.

She wishes to have this assistance in order to be able to give her children improved financial stability.

loans.use: To buy materials for sewing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make improvements to his home, to lay down a floor and build a room

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero, es albañil, el está solicitando su primer crédito para comprar una computadora que le servirá para sus estudios con la ayuda de sus familiares podrá salida adelante con su préstamo, trabaja medio tiempo y estudia.
texts.en:
Jose is 19 years old, single, and is a brick mason. He is requesting his first loan. 

Jose wishes to purchase a computer to help him in his studies. With his family's help, he will be able to keep up his payments. Jose works part-time and is a student.

loans.use: TO BUY A COMPUTER TO HELP WITH SCHOOL WORK

loans.name: Eva Tomasa

texts.es: Eva tiene cuarenta y un año, casada, cuenta con 2 hijas  y con el apoyo de su esposo Carlos han logrado salir adelante ya que los dos se dedican al tejido de fajas típicas. Eva tiene 23 años de experiencia  y por esa razón esta solicitando su primer préstamo es un apersona muy responsable y necesita esta ayuda para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio.
texts.en: Eva is 40 years old.  She is married and has two children.  With the help of her husband, they have managed to get ahead.  They both weave typical skirts.  Eva has been doing this for 23 years, so she is asking for her first loan.  She is a very responsible person and needs this help to invest in her business.

loans.use: Supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: TO BUY MATERIALS FOR HER EMBROIDERY WORK

loans.name: Victor Ramon

texts.es:
Don Víctor García es casado con dos personas a su cargo trabaja en Lotería Nacional como Guarda de seguridad vigilando las Instalaciones del Lugar.
El crédito que solicita es para compra de uniformes escolares pago de la universidad de su hija y otros gastos familiares.
texts.en: Víctor García is married and supports two people through his work as a security guard at the national lottery office.  He is asking for this loan in order to buy school uniforms, pay his daughter’s college tuition, and other family expenses.

loans.use: Education expenses

loans.name: Nita

texts.en:
Nita I. is from the village of Malintuboan Labason Zamboanga del Norte. She is 51 years old. Nita is married and has 3 adult-aged children. To make a living, Nita harvests and sells ocean-caught fish in the local community. Nita has been engaged in her business for over 4 years and earns approximately 3000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2010, Nita joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Nita is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional fish to sell. This will be Nita's first loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita B. is from the village of Patawag Liloy Zamboanga del norte. She is 51 years old. Carmelita is married and has 3 adult-aged children. To make a living, Carmelita owns and operates a specialized retail store selling daily use products such as shampoo, soap and toothpaste in the local community. Carmelita has been engaged in her business for over 4 years and earns approximately 4000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Carmelita joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Carmelita has successfully repaid a previous loan of 15000 PHP from PMPC. The previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Carmelita is requesting a new loan of 20000 PHP which will also be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Mely

texts.en:
Mely B. is from the village of Dansalan Labason Zamboanga Del Norte. She is 42 years old. Mely is widowed and has 2 school-aged children. To make a living, Mely provides clothing alteration and tailoring services to local community members. Mely has been engaged in her business for over 3 years and earns approximately 2000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Mely joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Mely is requesting a new loan of 5000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This will be Mely's first loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Eneclito

texts.en:
Eneclito D. is from the village of Patawag liloy Zamboanga del norte. He is 51 years old. Eneclito is married and has 2 adult-aged children. To make a living, Eneclito owns and operates a specialized retail store selling daily use products such as shampoo, soap and toothpaste in the local community. Eneclito has been engaged in his business for over 5 years and earns approximately 3000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2009, Eneclito joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Eneclito has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10000 PHP from PMPC. The previous loan was used to to purchase additional products to sell. Eneclito is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP which will also be used to purchase additional products to sell. This will be Eneclito's second loan from PMPC. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family. 

About PMPC:
